short_text: The Surah derives its name from the initial letter Qaf, thereby implying that it is the Surah which opens with the alphabetic letter Qaf.
text:
The Surah derives its name from the initial letter Qaf, thereby implying that it is the Surah which opens with the alphabetic letter Qaf.

Period of Revelation

There is no authentic tradition to show as to when exactly this Surah was sent down. A study of the subject matter, however, reveals that its period of revelation is the second stage of the Holy Prophet's life at Makkah, which lasted from the third year of the Prophethood till the fifth year. We have given the characteristics of this period in the Introduction to the Surah Al-An'am. In view of those characteristics it can be said that this Surah might have been sent down in about the 5th year, when the antagonism of the disbelievers had become quite intense but had not yet assumed tyrannical proportions.

Theme and Topics

Authentic traditions show that the Holy Prophet used to recite this Surah generally in the Prayer on the Eid days. A woman named Umm Hisham bin Harithah, who was a neighbor of the Holy Prophet, says that she was able to commit Surah Qaf to memory only because she often heard it from the Holy Prophet in the Friday sermons. According to some other traditions he often recited it in the Fajr Prayer. This makes it abundantly clear that this was an important Surah in the sight of the Holy Prophet. That is why he made sure that its contents reached as many people as possible over and over again.

This reason for this importance can be easily understood by a careful study of the Surah. The theme of the entire Surah is the Hereafter. When the Holy Prophet started preaching his message in Makkah what surprised the people most was the news that people would be resurrected after death, and they would have to render an account of their deeds. They said that that was impossible; human mind could not believe that that would happen. After all, how could it be possible that when the body had disintegrated into dust the scattered particles would be reassembled after hundreds of thousands of years to make up the same body once again and raised up as a living body, Allah in response sent down this discourse. In it, on the one hand, arguments have been given for the possibility and occurrence of the Hereafter in a brief way, in short sentences, and, on the other, the people have been warned, as if to say: "Whether you express wonder and surprise, or you regard it as something remote
from reason, or deny it altogether, in any case it cannot change the truth. The absolute, un-alterable truth is that Allah knows the whereabouts of each and every particle of your body that has scattered away in the earth, and knows where and in what state it is. Allah's one signal is enough to make all the scattered particles gather together again and to make you rise up once again as you had been made in the first instance. Likewise, your this idea that you have been created and left free to yourselves in the world and that you have not been made answerable to anyone, is no more than a misunderstanding. The fact is that not only is Allah Himself directly aware of each act and word of yours, even of the ideas that pass in your mind, but His angels also are attached to each one of you, who are preserving the record of whatever you do and utter. When the time comes, you will come out of your graves at one call just as young shoots of vegetable sprout up from the earth on the first
shower of the rain. Then this heedlessness which obstructs your vision will be removed and you will see with your own eyes all that you are denying today. At that time you will realize that you had not been created to be irresponsible in this world but accountable to all your deeds the meeting out of the rewards and punishments, the Hell and Heaven, which you regard as impossible and imaginary things, will at that time become visible realities for you in consequence of your enmity and opposition to the Truth you will be cast into the same Hell which you regard as remote from reason today and the ones who fear the Merciful God and return to the path of righteousness, will be admitted to the same Paradise at whose mention you now express wonder and surprise.
description: The surah that opens with the single discrete Arabic letter Qāf. It deals predominantly with the Resurrection and the Day of Judgement. Reference is made to previous generations of disbelievers (verse 12 .), both to warn the disbelievers in Mecca and to reassure the Prophet. Creation is cited as an indication of God’s ability to bring the dead to life again (verse 3 .), and emphasis is placed on the powerlessness of man on the Day of Resurrection (verse 20). The surah both opens and closes with mention of the Quran.

Albanian.verse 50:2: Po, ata janë çuditur që nga mesi i tyre u ka ardhur një paralajmërues, e mohuesit thonë: “Kjo gjë është e çuditshme”.
Albanian.verse 50:3: Vallë, a pasi të vdesin e të bëhemi dhé (do të ringjallemi)? Ai kthim është i largët!”
Albanian.verse 50:4: Na dimë çka do t’ua mungojë toka atyre (pasi të vdesin), te Ne është Libri që i ruan të gjitha.
Albanian.verse 50:5: Aq më tepër, ta e mohuan të Vërtetën kur u erdhi dhe ata janë në gjendje të luhatshme (në çështjen e profetnisë).
Albanian.verse 50:6: A, nuk e kanë shikuar ata qiellin që qëndron mbi ta, si e kemi ndërtuar dhe zbukuruar, e i cili nuk ka kurrfarë të mete (çrregullimi)!
Albanian.verse 50:7: E, Tokën e kemi shtruar dhe në të kemi shpërndarë male të palëvizshme dhe kemi bërë që nga ajo të mbijnë gjithfarë lloj bimësh të bukur,
Albanian.verse 50:8: për t’u menduar dhe këshilluar çdo rob që i drjtohet Zotit të vet.
Albanian.verse 50:9: Ne nga qielli lëshojmë ujin (shiun) e bekuar dhe bëjmë që me të, të ujiten kopshtijet dhe drithërat që korren.
Albanian.verse 50:10: Dhe palmet e hurmës së lartë me kalavesh njëri mbi tjetrin,
Albanian.verse 50:11: ushqim për robërit (njerëzit), dhe Ne me shi e ringjallim tokën (visin) e vdekur; e kështu do të jetë edhe dalja (prej tokës – ringjallja).
Albanian.verse 50:12: Pas tyre, kanë mohuar populli i Nuhut, edhe banorët e Ressit dhe Themudi,
Albanian.verse 50:13: dhe Adi dhe Faraoni, dhe vëllezërit (populli) e Lutit,
Albanian.verse 50:14: edhe banorët e Ejkës dhe populli i Tubbas; të gjithë ata i kanë përgënjeshtruar pejgamberët dhe ndaj tyre u sendërtua dënimi Im.
Albanian.verse 50:15: E, vallë, mos jemi lodhur Ne gjatë krijimit të parë? Jo, por ata dyshojnë në krijimin e sërishëm.
Albanian.verse 50:16: Na e kemi krijuar njeriun dhe Na dimë çka i pëshpërit shpirti atij, se Ne (me dijeninë Tonë) jemi më afër se damari i tij i qafës,
Albanian.verse 50:17: (dhe nga të dy engjëjt) të cilët i rrinë atij nga ana e djathtë dhe e majtë,
Albanian.verse 50:18: dhe ai nuk e thotë asnjë fjalë e që pranë tij të mos jetë ai që mbikëqyrë.
Albanian.verse 50:19: Mundimet e vdekjes do të arrijnë me siguri – kësaj nuk mund t’i ikësh
Albanian.verse 50:20: dhe do të fryhet në Sur – kjo është Dita e premtimit –
Albanian.verse 50:21: dhe çdonjëri do të vijë, e me të ka grahës dhe dëshmitar.
Albanian.verse 50:22: Ti, me të vërtetë, ke qenë i pakujdesshëm për këtë (momentin e vdekjes), andaj ta kemi ngritur perden (e syve), dhe shikimi yt sot është i prehtë.
Albanian.verse 50:23: E, shoku i tij do të thotë: “Ky pranë meje, është i gatshëm”
Albanian.verse 50:24: (u thuhet): “Hidheni në zjarr çdo mohues inatçi,
Albanian.verse 50:25: pengues i të mirave, që kalon (kufirin) dhe i cili dyshon (në fé),
Albanian.verse 50:26: i cili, pos Perëndisë, beson në zot tjetër – andaj hidhe atë në dënimin më të rëndë!”
Albanian.verse 50:27: E, shoku i tij do të thotë: “O Zoti ynë, unë nuk e kam mashtruar atë, por ai vet ka qenë në humbje të madhe”.
Albanian.verse 50:28: Atyre (Perëndia) do t’ju thotë: “Mos u grindni para Meje, Unë ju kam lajmëruar premtimin (dënimin),
Albanian.verse 50:29: Fjala Ime nuk ndryshohet dhe Unë nuk jam zullumqar i robërve të Mi”.
Albanian.verse 50:30: Në Ditën kur do ta pyesin xhehennemin: “A u mbushe?” e ai, përgjigjet: “A ka edhe më?”
Albanian.verse 50:31: E, xhenneti do t’u afrohet besimtarëve, jo larg.
Albanian.verse 50:32: Kjo ju është premtuar, çdokujt që është penduar dhe ruajtur (nga kalimi i kufirit),
Albanian.verse 50:33: i cili frikohet prej Perëndisë edhe atëhrë kur nuk e sheh kush dhe i cili vie me zemër të kthyer kah Perëndia”.
Albanian.verse 50:34: (U thuhet atyre): “Hyni në të (në xhennet), në qetësi (e mirësi), kjo është Dita e përhershme!”
Albanian.verse 50:35: Në të do të kenë çka të duan – e prej Nesh edhe më shumë.
Albanian.verse 50:36: E, sa gjenerata i kemi shkatërruar par tyre, duke qenë ata më të fortë (se Kurejshit) dhe ata bredhnin nëpër Tokë. – E, a kanë mund të gjejnë strehim?!
Albanian.verse 50:37: Me të vërtetë, për të gjitha këto ka këshillë për atë që ka mend ose që dëgjon, e që është i përqëndruar.
Albanian.verse 50:38: Ne, kemi krijuar qiejt dhe Tokën dhe çdo gjë që gjendet mes tyre për gjashtë ditë (periudha kohore), dhe nuk na përshkoi kurrëfarë lodhje.
Albanian.verse 50:39: Andaj, duroje atë që e thonë ata dhe madhëroje Zotin tënd, dhe falenderoje Atë para lindjes së diellit dhe para muzgut,
Albanian.verse 50:40: dhe madhëroje Atë në një pjesë të natës dhe pas kryerjes së namazit.
Albanian.verse 50:41: Dhe përgjoje ti! Ditën kur thërritësi (engjëlli) thërret prej vendit të afërt,
Albanian.verse 50:42: Ditën kur ata do ta dëgjojnë zërin e vërtetë, ajo do të jetë Dita e daljes (ringjalljes).
Albanian.verse 50:43: Na, me të vërtetë, japim gjallëri dhe japim vdekje dhe te Ne është kthimi!
Albanian.verse 50:44: E, në Ditën kur toka do të çahet e të dalin ata me nxitim; kjo është ringjallja, për Ne (kjo) është lehtë.
Albanian.verse 50:45: Na dimë mirë çka thonë ata; e ti nuk je ai që i shtrëngon ata (të besojnë), por këshilloje me Kur’an atë që i druan premtimit (dënimit) Tim!

Amharic.verse 50:2: ይልቁንም ከነሱ ጎሳ የኾነ አስፈራሪ ስለ መጣላቸው ተደነቁ፡፡ ከሓዲዎቹም «ይህ አስደናቂ ነገር ነው» አሉ፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:3: «በሞትንና ዐፈር በኾን ጊዜ (እንመለሳለን?) ይህ ሩቅ የኾነ መመለስ ነው፤» (አሉ)፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:4: ከእነርሱ (አካል) ምድር የምታጎድለውን በእርግጥ ዐውቀናል፡፡ እኛም ዘንድ ጠባቂ መጽሐፍ አልለ፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:5: (አልተመለከቱም)፡፡ ይልቁንም በቁርኣን በመጣላቸው ጊዜ አስተባበሉ፡፡ እነርሱም በተማታ ነገር ውሰጥ ናቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:6: ወደ ሰማይም ከበላያቸው ስትኾን ለእርሷ ምንም ቀዳዳዎች የሌሏት ኾና እንዴት እንደ ገነባናትና (በከዋክብት) እንዳጌጥናት አልተመለከቱምን?
Amharic.verse 50:7: ምድርንም ዘረጋናት፡፡ በእርሷም ውስጥ ጋራዎችን ጣልንባት፡፡ በውስጧም ከሚያስደስት ዓይነት ሁሉ አበቀልን፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:8: (ይህንን ያደረግነው) ተመላሽ ለኾነ ባሪያ ሁሉ ለማሳየትና ለማስገንዘብ ነው፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:9: ከሰማይም ብሩክን ውሃ አወረድን፡፡ በእርሱም አትክልቶችንና የሚታጨድን (አዝመራ) ፍሬ አበቀልን፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:10: ዘምባባንም ረዣዢም ለእርሷ የተደራረበ እንቡጥ ያላት ስትኾን (አበቀልን)፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:11: ለባሮቹ ሲሳይ ትኾን ዘንድ (አዘጋጀናት)፡፡ በእርሱም የሞተችን አገር ሕያው አደረግንበት፡፡ (ከመቃብር) መውጣትም እንደዚሁ ነው፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:12: ከእነርሱ በፊት የኑሕ ሕዝቦችና የረሰስ ሰዎች፤ ሰሙድም አስተባበሉ፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:14: የአይከት ሰዎችም የቱብበዕ ሕዝቦችም ሁሉም መልከተኞቹን አስተባበሉ፡፡ ዛቻዬም ተረጋገጠባቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:15: በፊተኛው መፍጠር ደከምን? በእውነቱ እነርሱ ከአዲስ መፍጠር በመጠራጠር ውስጥ ናቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:16: ሰውንም ነፍሱ (በሐሳቡ) የምታጫውተውን የምናውቅ ስንኾን በእርግጥ ፈጠርነው፤ እኛም ከደም ጋኑ ጅማት ይበልጥ ወደርሱ ቅርብ ነን፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:17: ሁለቱ ቃል ተቀባዮች (መላእክት) ከቀኝና ከግራ ተቀማጮች ኾነው በሚቀበሉ ጊዜ (አስታውስ)፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:18: ከቃል ምንም አይናገርም በአጠገቡ ተጠባባቂና ዝግጁ የኾኑ (መላእክት) ያሉበት ቢኾን እንጅ፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:19: የሞትም መከራ እውነቱን ነገር ታመጣለች፡፡ (ሰው ሆይ)፡- «ይህ ያ ከርሱ ትሸሸው የነበርከው ነው» (ይባላል)፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:20: በቀንዱም ውስጥ ይንነፋል፡፡ ያ (ቀን) የዛቻው (መፈጸሚያ) ቀን ነው፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:21: ነፍስም ሁሉ ከእርሷ ጋር ነጂና መስካሪ ያለባት ኾና ትመጣለች፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:22: «ከዚህ ነገር በእርግጥ በዝንጋቴ ውስጥ ነበርክ፡፡ ሺፋንህንም ካንተ ላይ ገለጥንልህ፡፡ ስለዚህ ዛሬ ዓይንህ ስለታም ነው» (ይባላል)፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:23: ቁራኛውም (መልአክ) «ይህ ያ እኔ ዘንድ ያለው ቀራቢ ነው» ይላል፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:25: «ለበጎ ሥራ ከልካይ፣ በዳይ፣ ተጠራጣሪ የኾነን ሁሉ፤» (ጣሉ)፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:26: «ያንን ከአላህ ጋር ሌላን አምላክ ያደረገውን በብርቱ ቅጣት ውስጥ ጣሉት፤» (ይባላል)፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:27: ቁራኛው (ሰይጣን) «ጌታችን ሆይ! እኔ አላሳሳትኩትም፡፡ ግን (ራሱ) በሩቅ ስሕተት ውስጥ ነበር» ይላል፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:28: (አላህ) «ወደእናንተ ዛቻን በእርግጥ ያስቀደምኩ ስኾን እኔ ዘንድ አትጨቃጨቁ» ይላቸዋል፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:29: «ቃሉ እኔ ዘንድ አይለወጥም፡፡ እኔም ለባሮቼ ፈጽሞ በዳይ አይደለሁም» (ይላቸዋል)፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:30: ለገሀነም «ሞላሽን? የምንልበትንና ጭማሪ አለን? የምትልበትን ቀን» (አስጠንቅቃቸው)፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:31: ገነትም አላህን ለፈሩት እሩቅ ባልኾነ ስፍራ ትቅቀረባለች፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:32: «ይህ ወደ አላህ ተመላሽና (ሕግጋቱን) ጠባቂ ለኾነ ሁሉ የተቀጠራችሁት ነው» (ይባላሉ)፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:33: «አልረሕማንን በሩቁ ኾኖ ለፈራና በንጹሕ ልብ ለመጣ» (ትቅቀረባለች)፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:35: ለነርሱ በውስጧ ሲኾኑ የሚሹት ሁሉ አልላቸው፡፡ እኛም ዘንድ ጭማሪ አልለ፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:36: ከእነርሱም (ከቁረይሾች) በፊት ከክፍለ ዘመናት ሕዝቦች ብዙዎችን እነርሱ በኀያልነት ከእነርሱ ይበልጥ የበረቱ የኾኑትን (ማምለጫ ፍለጋ) በየአገሮቹም የመረመሩትን አጥፍተናል፡፡ ማምለጫ አለን?
Amharic.verse 50:37: በዚህ ውሰጥ ለእርሱ ልብ ላለው ወይም እርሱ (በልቡ) የተጣደ ኾኖ (ወደሚነበብለት) ጆሮውን ለጣለ ሰው ግሳጼ አለበት፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:38: ሰማያትንና ምድርን በመካከላቸው ያለውንም ሁሉ በስድስት ቀናት ውስጥ በእርግጥ ፈጠርን፡፡ ድካምም ምንም አልነካንም፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:39: በሚሉትም ላይ ታገሥ፤ ጌታህንም ከማመስገን ጋር ፀሐይ ከመውጣቷ በፊት ከመግባቷም በፊት አወድሰው፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:41: (የሚነገርህን) አዳምጥም፡፡ ጠሪው ከቅርብ ስፍራ በሚጠራበት ቀን (ከመቃብራቸው ይወጣሉ)፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:42: ጩኸቲቱን በእውነት የሚሰሙበት ቀን ያ (ከመቃብር) የመውጫው ቀን ነው፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:43: እኛ እኛው ሕያው እናደርጋለን፡፡ እንገድላለንም፡፡ መመለሻም ወደእኛ ብቻ ነው፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:44: የሚፈጥኑ ኾነው ምድር ከእነርሱ ላይ የምትሰነጣጠቅበት ቀን (የመውጫው ቀን ነው)፡፡ ይህ በእኛ ላይ ገር የኾነ መሰብሰብ ነው፡፡
Amharic.verse 50:45: እኛ የሚሉትን ሁሉ ዐዋቂ ነን፡፡ አንተም በእነርሱ ላይ አስገዳጅ አይደለህም፡፡ ስለዚህ ዛቻየን የሚፈራን ሰው በቁርኣን አስታውስ፡፡

Arabic.verse 50:6: ٍجوُرُف نِم اَهَل اَمَو اَهاَّنَّيَزَو اَهاَنْيَنَب َفْيَك ْمُهَقْوَف ِءاَمَّسلا ىَلِإ اوُرُظنَي ْمَلَفَأ
Arabic.verse 50:7: ٍجيِهَب ٍجْوَز ِّلُك نِم اَهيِف اَنْتَبنَأَو َيِساَوَر اَهيِف اَنْيَقْلَأَو اَهاَنْدَدَم َضْرَأْلاَو
Arabic.verse 50:36: (ٍصيِحَّم نِم ْلَه ِداَلِبْلا يِف اوُبَّقَنَف اًشْطَب مُهْنِم ُّدَشَأ ْمُه ٍنْرَق نِّم مُهَلْبَق اَنْكَلْهَأ ْمَكَو
Arabic.verse 50:38: (ٍبوُغُّل نِم اَنَّسَم اَمَو ٍماَّيَأ ِةَّتِس يِف اَمُهَنْيَب اَمَو َضْرَأْلاَو ِتاَواَمَّسلا اَنْقَلَخ ْدَقَلَو

Azerbaijani.verse 50:2: Onlara öz aralarından xəbərdarlıq edən bir peyğəmbər gəlməsinə təəccüb edən kafirlər dedilər: “Bu çox qəribə bir şeydir.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:3: Məgər biz ölüb torpağa qarışdıqdan sonra yenidən diriləcəyik? Bu, əlçatmaz bir qayıdışdır!”
Azerbaijani.verse 50:4: Həqiqətən, Biz yerin onlardan nəyi alıb əskiltdiyini bilirik. Bizdə hər şeyi qoruyan bir Kitab (Lövhi-məhfuz) vardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:5: Lakin həqiqət onlara məlum olduqda onu yalan hesab etdilər. İndi onlar çaşqın vəziyyətdədirlər.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:6: Məgər onlar başları üstündəki göyə baxıb onu necə yaratdığımızı və necə bəzədiyimizi görmürlərmi? Orada heç bir yarıq da yoxdur.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:7: Biz yeri döşədik, orada möhkəm dağlar yerləşdirdik və gözoxşayan bitkilərin hər növündən yetişdirdik.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:8: Bunu, Allaha üz tutan hər bir qul üçün ibrət və öyüd-nəsihət olsun deyə belə etdik.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:9: Biz göydən bərəkətli su endirdik, onunla bağlar və biçilən taxıl dənələri bitirdik.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:10: Eləcə də meyvələri salxım-salxım asılmış hündür xurma ağacları bitirdik.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:11: Qullara ruzi olsun deyə belə etdik! Biz onunla ölü bir məmləkəti diriltdik. Dirilib qəbirdən çıxmaq da belədir.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:12: Onlardan əvvəl Nuh qövmü, Rəss əhli, Səmud tayfası elçiləri yalançı saydı.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:13: Ad qövmü, Firon xalqı, Lut tayfası,
Azerbaijani.verse 50:14: Əykə əhli və Tubba qövmü – bunların hamısı elçiləri yalançı saydı və Mənim təhdidim gerçəkləşdi.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:15: Məgər Biz ilk yaradılışdan zəiflədikmi? Xeyr! Onlar yeni yaradılış olan dirilmə barəsində şübhə içindədirlər.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:16: İnsanı Biz yaratdıq və nəfsinin ona nəyi vəsvəsə etdiyini də bilirik. Biz ona şah damarından da yaxınıq.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:17: Sağında və solunda iki mələk oturub onun əməllərini qeydə alır.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:18: Dediyi elə bir söz yoxdur ki, onu yazmaq üçün yanında hazır durmuş gözətçi olmasın.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:19: Ölüm bihuşluğu həqiqətən gələcəkdir. Ey insan! Bu sənin uzaq qaçdığın şeydir.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:20: Sur üfürüləcəkdir. Bu, vəd olunmuş təhdid günüdür.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:21: Hər kəs onu qova-qova məhşərə gətirənlə və bir də əməllərinə şahidlik edənlə birlikdə gələcəkdir.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:22: Sən bunun (bu günün) haqqında qəflət içində idin. Amma Biz pərdəni sənin üzündən qaldırdıq. Sən bu gün çox yaxşı görürsən!”
Azerbaijani.verse 50:24: Allah əmr edib deyəcək: “Atın Cəhənnəmə hər bir inadcıl kafiri,
Azerbaijani.verse 50:25: xeyrə mane olanı, azğınlaşıb həddi aşanı, şübhə edəni,
Azerbaijani.verse 50:26: başqa bir məbudu Allaha tay tutanı. Atın onu şiddətli əzabın içinə!”
Azerbaijani.verse 50:27: Yoldaşı (şeytan) deyəcəkdir: “Ey Rəbbimiz! Onu mən yoldan çıxartmadım, əksinə, o özü dərin azğınlıq içində idi!”
Azerbaijani.verse 50:28: Allah deyəcəkdir: “Mənim hüzurumda höcətləşməyin. Mən əvvəlcədən sizi xəbərdar etmişdim.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:29: Mənim Sözüm dəyişməzdir. Mən bəndələrə zülm edən deyiləm!”
Azerbaijani.verse 50:30: O gün Biz Cəhənnəmə: “Doldunmu?”– deyəcəyik. O isə: “Yenə varmı?”– deyəcəkdir.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:31: Cənnət müttəqilərə yaxınlaşdırılacaq, onlardan uzaqda olmayacaqdır.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:32: Budur sizə vəd edilən Cənnət! O, hər bir tövbə edib Allaha üz tutan, Onun əmrinə riayət edən,
Azerbaijani.verse 50:33: Mərhəmətli Allahdan Onu görmədən qorxan və Allaha yönəlmiş qəlblə gələn kimsələr üçündür.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:34: Ora sağ-salamat daxil olun! Bu, Əbədiyyət günüdür.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:35: Orada onlar üçün istədikləri hər şey hazırlanmışdır. Üstəlik hüzurumuzda bundan da artığı Allahı görmək vardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:36: Biz onlardan əvvəl özlərindən daha qüvvətli neçə-neçə nəsilləri məhv etdik. Onlar diyarbədiyar gəzib dolaşırdılar. Məgər əzabdan qaçıb qurtara bildilərmi?”
Azerbaijani.verse 50:37: Həqiqətən, bunda həssas qəlbi olan, hazır durub diqqətlə qulaq asan kimsə üçün ibrət vardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:38: Biz göyləri, yeri və onların arasında olanları altı gündə yaratdıq və Bizə heç bir yorğunluq üz vermədi.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:39: Sən onların dediklərinə səbir et! Gün doğmamışdan əvvəl və batmamışdan əvvəl Rəbbini həmd ilə təriflə!
Azerbaijani.verse 50:40: Gecənin bir vaxtında və səcdələrdən sonra Onun şəninə təriflər de!
Azerbaijani.verse 50:41: Dinlə ey Peyğəmbər! O gün carçı yaxın bir yerdən çağıracaqdır.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:42: O gün onlar bu səsi gerçəkdən eşidəcəklər. Bu, qəbirlərdən çıxma günüdür.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:43: Şübhəsiz ki, dirildən də, öldürən də Bizik. Dönüş də yalnız Bizədir.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:44: O gün yer onlardan ötrü yarılacaq, onlar sürətlə carçıya doğru çıxacaqlar. Beləcə, onları bir yerə yığmaq Bizim üçün asandır.
Azerbaijani.verse 50:45: Biz onların nə dediklərini yaxşı bilirik. Sən onları məcbur edən deyilsən. Sən Mənim təhdidimdən qorxanlara Quranla öyüd-nəsihət ver!

Bengali.verse 50:2: বরং তারা তাদের মধ্য থেকেই একজন ভয় প্রদর্শনকারী আগমন করেছে দেখে বিস্ময় বোধ করে। অতঃপর কাফেররা বলেঃ এটা আশ্চর্যের ব্যাপার।
Bengali.verse 50:3: আমরা মরে গেলে এবং মৃত্তিকায় পরিণত হয়ে গেলেও কি পুনরুত্থিত হব? এ প্রত্যাবর্তন সুদূরপরাহত।
Bengali.verse 50:4: মৃত্তিকা তাদের কতটুকু গ্রাস করবে, তা আমার জানা আছে এবং আমার কাছে আছে সংরক্ষিত কিতাব।
Bengali.verse 50:5: বরং তাদের কাছে সত্য আগমন করার পর তারা তাকে মিথ্যা বলছে। ফলে তারা সংশয়ে পতিত রয়েছে।
Bengali.verse 50:6: তারা কি তাদের উপরস্থিত আকাশের পানে দৃষ্টিপাত করে না আমি কিভাবে তা নির্মাণ করেছি এবং সুশোভিত করেছি? তাতে কোন ছিদ্রও নেই।
Bengali.verse 50:7: আমি ভূমিকে বিস্তৃত করেছি, তাতে পর্বতমালার ভার স্থাপন করেছি এবং তাতে সর্বপ্রকার নয়নাভিরাম উদ্ভিদ উদগত করেছি।
Bengali.verse 50:8: এটা জ্ঞান আহরণ ও স্মরণ করার মত ব্যাপার প্রত্যেক অনুরাগী বান্দার জন্যে।
Bengali.verse 50:9: আমি আকাশ থেকে কল্যাণময় বৃষ্টি বর্ষণ করি এবং তদ্বারা বাগান ও শস্য উদগত করি, যেগুলোর ফসল আহরণ করা হয়।
Bengali.verse 50:10: এবং লম্বমান খর্জুর বৃক্ষ, যাতে আছে গুচ্ছ গুচ্ছ খর্জুর,
Bengali.verse 50:11: বান্দাদের জীবিকাস্বরূপ এবং বৃষ্টি দ্বারা আমি মৃত জনপদকে সঞ্জীবিত করি। এমনিভাবে পুনরুত্থান ঘটবে।
Bengali.verse 50:12: তাদের পূর্বে মিথ্যাবাদী বলেছে নূহের সম্প্রদায়, কুপবাসীরা এবং সামুদ সম্প্রদায়।
Bengali.verse 50:14: বনবাসীরা এবং তোব্বা সম্প্রদায়। প্রত্যেকেই রসূলগণকে মিথ্যা বলেছে, অতঃপর আমার শাস্তির যোগ্য হয়েছে।
Bengali.verse 50:15: আমি কি প্রথমবার সৃষ্টি করেই ক্লান্ত হয়ে পড়েছি? বরং তারা নতুন সৃষ্টির ব্যাপারে সন্দেহ পোষন করেছে।
Bengali.verse 50:16: আমি মানুষ সৃষ্টি করেছি এবং তার মন নিভৃতে যে কুচিন্তা করে, সে সম্বন্ধেও আমি অবগত আছি। আমি তার গ্রীবাস্থিত ধমনী থেকেও অধিক নিকটবর্তী।
Bengali.verse 50:17: যখন দুই ফেরেশতা ডানে ও বামে বসে তার আমল গ্রহণ করে।
Bengali.verse 50:18: সে যে কথাই উচ্চারণ করে, তাই গ্রহণ করার জন্যে তার কাছে সদা প্রস্তুত প্রহরী রয়েছে।
Bengali.verse 50:19: মৃত্যুযন্ত্রণা নিশ্চিতই আসবে। এ থেকেই তুমি টালবাহানা করতে।
Bengali.verse 50:20: এবং শিঙ্গায় ফুঁৎকার দেয়া হবে এটা হবে ভয় প্রদর্শনের দিন।
Bengali.verse 50:21: প্রত্যেক ব্যক্তি আগমন করবে। তার সাথে থাকবে চালক ও কর্মের সাক্ষী।
Bengali.verse 50:22: তুমি তো এই দিন সম্পর্কে উদাসীন ছিলে। এখন তোমার কাছ থেকে যবনিকা সরিয়ে দিয়েছি। ফলে আজ তোমার দৃষ্টি সুতীক্ষ্ন।
Bengali.verse 50:23: তার সঙ্গী ফেরেশতা বলবেঃ আমার কাছে যে, আমলনামা ছিল, তা এই।
Bengali.verse 50:24: তোমরা উভয়েই নিক্ষেপ কর জাহান্নামে প্রত্যেক অকৃতজ্ঞ বিরুদ্ধবাদীকে,
Bengali.verse 50:25: যে বাধা দিত মঙ্গলজনক কাজে, সীমালঙ্ঘনকারী, সন্দেহ পোষণকারীকে।
Bengali.verse 50:26: যে ব্যক্তি আল্লাহর সাথে অন্য উপাস্য গ্রহণ করত, তাকে তোমরা কঠিন শাস্তিতে নিক্ষেপ কর।
Bengali.verse 50:27: তার সঙ্গী শয়তান বলবেঃ হে আমাদের পালনকর্তা, আমি তাকে অবাধ্যতায় লিপ্ত করিনি। বস্তুতঃ সে নিজেই ছিল সুদূর পথভ্রান্তিতে লিপ্ত।
Bengali.verse 50:28: আল্লাহ বলবেনঃ আমার সামনে বাকবিতন্ডা করো না আমি তো পূর্বেই তোমাদেরকে আযাব দ্বারা ভয় প্রদর্শন করেছিলাম।
Bengali.verse 50:29: আমার কাছে কথা রদবদল হয় না এবং আমি বান্দাদের প্রতি জুলুমকারী নই।
Bengali.verse 50:30: যেদিন আমি জাহান্নামকে জিজ্ঞাসা করব; তুমি কি পূর্ণ হয়ে গেছ? সে বলবেঃ আরও আছে কি?
Bengali.verse 50:31: জান্নাতকে উপস্থিত করা হবে খোদাভীরুদের অদূরে।
Bengali.verse 50:32: তোমাদের প্রত্যেক অনুরাগী ও স্মরণকারীকে এরই প্রতিশ্রুতি দেয়া হয়েছিল।
Bengali.verse 50:33: যে না দেখে দয়াময় আল্লাহ তা’আলাকে ভয় করত এবং বিনীত অন্তরে উপস্থিত হত।
Bengali.verse 50:34: তোমরা এতে শান্তিতে প্রবেশ কর। এটাই অনন্তকাল বসবাসের জন্য প্রবেশ করার দিন।
Bengali.verse 50:35: তারা তথায় যা চাইবে, তাই পাবে এবং আমার কাছে রয়েছে আরও অধিক।
Bengali.verse 50:36: আমি তাদের পূর্বে বহু সম্প্রদায়কে ধ্বংস করেছি, তারা এদের অপেক্ষা অধিক শক্তিশালী ছিল এবং দেশে-বিদেশে বিচরণ করে ফিরত। তাদের কোন পলায়ন স্থান ছিল না।
Bengali.verse 50:37: এতে উপদেশ রয়েছে তার জন্যে, যার অনুধাবন করার মত অন্তর রয়েছে। অথবা সে নিবিষ্ট মনে শ্রবণ করে।
Bengali.verse 50:38: আমি নভোমন্ডল, ভূমন্ডল ও এতদুভয়ের মধ্যবর্তী সবকিছু ছয়দিনে সৃষ্টি করেছি এবং আমাকে কোনরূপ ক্লান্তি স্পর্শ করেনি।
Bengali.verse 50:39: অতএব, তারা যা কিছু বলে, তজ্জন্যে আপনি ছবর করুন এবং, সূর্যোদয় ও সূর্যাস্তের পূর্বে আপনার পালনকর্তার সপ্রশংস পবিত্রতা ঘোষণা করুন।
Bengali.verse 50:40: রাত্রির কিছু অংশে তাঁর পবিত্রতা ঘোষণা করুন এবং নামাযের পশ্চাতেও।
Bengali.verse 50:41: শুন, যে দিন এক আহবানকারী নিকটবর্তী স্থান থেকে আহবান করবে।
Bengali.verse 50:42: যেদিন মানুষ নিশ্চিত সেই ভয়াবহ আওয়াজ শুনতে পাবে, সেদিনই পুনরত্থান দিবস।
Bengali.verse 50:43: আমি জীবন দান করি, মৃত্যু ঘটাই এবং আমারই দিকে সকলের প্রত্যাবর্তন।
Bengali.verse 50:44: যেদিন ভূমন্ডল বিদীর্ণ হয়ে মানুষ ছুটাছুটি করে বের হয়ে আসবে। এটা এমন সমবেত করা, যা আমার জন্যে অতি সহজ।
Bengali.verse 50:45: তারা যা বলে, তা আমি সম্যক অবগত আছি। আপনি তাদের উপর জোরজবরকারী নন। অতএব, যে আমার শাস্তিকে ভয় করে, তাকে কোরআনের মাধ্যমে উপদেশ দান করুন।

Berber Amazigh.verse 50:28: Inna: "ur ppemnamaret ara $uôI, imi wen d Zzewre$ aâggen.

Berber Amazigh.verse 50:31: Tqeôb ed Loennet, ar wid ipêezziben, ur tebâad.
Berber Amazigh.verse 50:32: "D tagi i wen ippuwaââden; i yal atubi iêerzen,

Bosnian.verse 50:2: oni se čude što im je došao jedan od njih da ih opominje, pa, nevjernici, govore: "To je čudna stvar:
Bosnian.verse 50:3: zar kad pomremo i zemlja postanemo…? Nezamisliv je to povratak!"
Bosnian.verse 50:4: Mi znamo šta će od njih zemlja oduzeti, u Nas je Knjiga u kojoj se sve čuva.
Bosnian.verse 50:5: Oni, međutim, poriču Istinu koja im dolazi i smeteni su.
Bosnian.verse 50:6: A zašto ne pogledaju nebo iznad sebe? – kako smo ga sazdali i ukrasili i kako u njemu nema nereda!
Bosnian.verse 50:7: A Zemlju smo rasprostrli i po njoj nepomična brda pobacali i dali da iz nje niče raznovrsno prekrasno bilje,
Bosnian.verse 50:8: da bi razmislio i opomenuo se svaki rob koji se Gospodaru svome obraća.
Bosnian.verse 50:9: Mi s neba spuštamo vodu kao blagoslov, i činimo da, uz pomoć njenu, niču vrtovi i žito koje se žanje
Bosnian.verse 50:10: i visoke palme u kojih su zameci nagomilani jedni iznad drugih,
Bosnian.verse 50:11: kao hranu robovima, i Mi njome oživljavamo mrtav predjel; takvo će biti i oživljenje.
Bosnian.verse 50:12: Prije njih poricali su narod Nuhov, i stanovnici Ressa, i Semud
Bosnian.verse 50:13: i Ad, i narod faraonov, i narod Lutov,
Bosnian.verse 50:14: i stanovnici Ejke i narod Tubba'; svi su oni poslanike lažnim smatrali i kaznu Moju zaslužili.
Bosnian.verse 50:15: Pa zar smo prilikom prvog stvaranja malaksali? Ne, ali oni u ponovno stvaranje sumnjaju.
Bosnian.verse 50:16: Mi stvaramo čovjeka i znamo šta mu sve duša njegova haje, jer Mi smo njemu bliži od vratne žile kucavice.
Bosnian.verse 50:17: Kad se dvojica sastanu i sjednu jedan s desne, a drugi s lijeve strane,
Bosnian.verse 50:18: on ne izusti nijednu riječ, a da pored njega nije prisutan onaj koji bdije.
Bosnian.verse 50:19: Smrtne muke će zbilja doći – to je nešto od čega ne možeš pobjeći
Bosnian.verse 50:20: i u Rog će se puhnuti – to je Dan kojim se prijeti –
Bosnian.verse 50:21: i svako će doći, a s njim i vodič i svjedok.
Bosnian.verse 50:22: "Ti nisi mario za ovo, pa smo ti skinuli koprenu tvoju, danas ti je oštar vid."
Bosnian.verse 50:23: A drug njegov će reći: "Ovaj, pored mene, spreman je."
Bosnian.verse 50:25: koji je branio da se čine dobra djela i koji je nasilnik i podozriv bio,
Bosnian.verse 50:26: koji je pored Allaha u drugog boga vjerovao – zato ga baci u patnju najtežu!"
Bosnian.verse 50:27: A drug njegov će reći: "Gospodaru naš, ja ga nisam silom zaveo, sam je u velikoj zabludi bio."
Bosnian.verse 50:28: "Ne prepirite se preda Mnom!" – reći će On – "još davno sam vam zaprijetio,
Bosnian.verse 50:29: Moja Riječ se ne mijenja i Ja nisam prema robovima Svojim nepravičan."
Bosnian.verse 50:30: Na dan kada upitamo Džehennem: "Jesi li se napunio?" – on će odgovoriti: "Ima li još?"
Bosnian.verse 50:31: A Džennet će biti primaknut čestitima, neće biti ni od jednog daleko –
Bosnian.verse 50:32: "Ovo je ono što vam je obećano, svakome onome koji se kajao i čuvao,
Bosnian.verse 50:33: koji se Milostivoga bojao, iako Ga nije vidio, i koji je srce odano donio.
Bosnian.verse 50:34: Uđite u nj, u miru, ovo je Dan vječni!"
Bosnian.verse 50:35: U njemu će imati što god zažele – a od Nas i više.
Bosnian.verse 50:36: A koliko smo naroda prije ovih uništili, koji su moćniji od njih bili, pa su po svijetu utočište tražili – od propasti spasa ima li?!
Bosnian.verse 50:37: U tome je, zaista, pouka za onoga ko razum ima ili ko sluša, a priseban je.
Bosnian.verse 50:38: Mi smo stvorili nebesa i Zemlju i ono što je između njih – za šest vremenskih razdoblja, i nije Nas ophrvao nikakav umor.
Bosnian.verse 50:39: Zato strpljivo podnosi ono što oni govore i veličaj Gospodara svoga i zahvaljuj Mu prije sunčeva izlaska i prije zalaska,
Bosnian.verse 50:40: i veličaj Ga noću i poslije obavljanja molitvi.
Bosnian.verse 50:41: I osluškuj! Dan kada će glasnik pozvati iz mjesta koje je blizu,
Bosnian.verse 50:42: Dan kada će oni čuti istinit glas – to će biti Dan oživljenja.
Bosnian.verse 50:43: Mi, zaista, dajemo život i dajemo smrt, i sve će se Nama vratiti!
Bosnian.verse 50:44: A na Dan kada će nad njima zemlja popucati oni će žurno izići; biće to oživljenje, za Nas lahko.
Bosnian.verse 50:45: Mi dobro znamo šta oni govore; ti ih ne možeš prisiliti, nego podsjeti Kur'anom onoga koji se prijetnje Moje boji!

Bulgarian.verse 50:1: Каф. Кълна се в славния Коран.
Bulgarian.verse 50:2: Да, учудиха се, че им се яви предупредител измежду тях. И рекоха неверниците: “Това е чудно нещо.
Bulgarian.verse 50:3: Нима след като умрем и станем на пръст [ще бъдем възкресени]? Такова завръщане е невероятно.”
Bulgarian.verse 50:4: Знаем Ние какво земята отнема от тях и имаме съхраняваща Книга.
Bulgarian.verse 50:5: Ала те взеха за лъжа истината, когато дойде при тях и са в недоумение.
Bulgarian.verse 50:6: Нима не виждат небето над тях, как Ние го изградихме и го украсихме, и е без процепи?
Bulgarian.verse 50:7: И земята разпростряхме, и положихме по нея непоклатими планини, и сторихме от нея да поникнат всякакви прекрасни видове -
Bulgarian.verse 50:8: поука и напомняне за всеки покайващ се раб.
Bulgarian.verse 50:9: И изсипваме от небето благословена вода, и сторваме да израстват чрез нея градини и зърно за жътва,
Bulgarian.verse 50:10: и високи палми с гроздове, скупчени един връз друг -
Bulgarian.verse 50:11: препитание за рабите. И съживяваме с нея мъртва земя. Така ще бъде и възкресението.
Bulgarian.verse 50:12: Преди тях смятаха, че е лъжа и народът на Нух, и обитателите на ар-Рас, и самудяните,
Bulgarian.verse 50:13: и адитите, и Фараонът, и братята на Лут,
Bulgarian.verse 50:14: и обитателите на Горичката, и народът на Туббаа. Всички смятаха за лъжци пратениците и се изпълни Моето обещание.
Bulgarian.verse 50:15: Нима Ни затрудни първото сътворяване? Ала се съмняват те в новото сътворяване.
Bulgarian.verse 50:16: Сътворихме Ние човека и знаем какво му нашепва неговата душа. Ние сме по-близо до него, отколкото вената на шията [му].
Bulgarian.verse 50:17: Отдясно и отляво на него стоят два записващи ангела,
Bulgarian.verse 50:18: не изрича и една дума, без да има готов надзорник при него.
Bulgarian.verse 50:19: И смъртната агония ще донесе истината: “Това е, което си избягвал.”
Bulgarian.verse 50:20: И ще се протръби с Рога. “Това е Денят на обещанието!”
Bulgarian.verse 50:21: И с всеки човек ще дойде водач и свидетел [от ангелите].
Bulgarian.verse 50:22: [И ще му се каже:] “Ти нехаеше за това. Но снехме от теб покривалото и твоят поглед Днес е проницателен.”
Bulgarian.verse 50:23: А съпътствалият го [ангел] ще каже: “Готово е това, което е у мен.”
Bulgarian.verse 50:26: който прие за бог друг заедно с Аллах! Затова го хвърлете в суровото мъчение!”
Bulgarian.verse 50:27: Съпътствалият го [сатана] ще каже: “Господи наш, не аз го накарах да престъпва, а сам той бе в дълбока заблуда.”
Bulgarian.verse 50:28: Ще каже [Аллах]: “Не се карайте пред Мен! Аз ви предупреждавах.
Bulgarian.verse 50:29: Не се променя Моето Слово. И не съм угнетител на рабите.”
Bulgarian.verse 50:30: В този Ден ще кажем на Ада: “Напълни ли се?” А той ще рече: “Има ли още?”
Bulgarian.verse 50:31: И не след дълго Раят ще бъде приближен за богобоязливите.
Bulgarian.verse 50:32: Това е, което ви бе обещано - за всеки покайващ се, спазващ [повелите],
Bulgarian.verse 50:33: който и в уединение се бои от Всемилостивия, и идва със сърце, молещо за прошка.
Bulgarian.verse 50:34: “Влезте тук в мир! Това е Денят на вечността!”
Bulgarian.verse 50:35: Ще имат там, каквото пожелаят, а при Нас има повече.
Bulgarian.verse 50:36: И колко поколения преди тях погубихме, а бяха по-силни от тях и обикаляха по земята! Но има ли избавление?
Bulgarian.verse 50:37: Наистина в това се съдържа поука за всеки, който има сърце или се вслушва и е свидетел.
Bulgarian.verse 50:38: Сътворихме Ние небесата и земята, и всичко между тях в шест дни, без да Ни засегне умора.
Bulgarian.verse 50:39: Бъди търпелив към това, което казват, и прославяй с възхвала своя Господ преди изгрева на слънцето и преди залеза!
Bulgarian.verse 50:40: И през нощта Го прославяй, и след поклоните!
Bulgarian.verse 50:41: И вслушвай се в Деня, когато прогласяващият ще прогласи от близко място!
Bulgarian.verse 50:42: В този Ден ще чуят Вика с истината. Това е Денят на възкресението.
Bulgarian.verse 50:43: Ние съживяваме и Ние умъртвяваме, и при Нас е завръщането.
Bulgarian.verse 50:44: В този Ден земята ще се разцепи над тях - забързани. Това е събиране, лесно за Нас.
Bulgarian.verse 50:45: Най-добре Ние знаем какво изричат. А ти не си за тях принудител. И поучавай с Корана всеки, който се страхува от Моето предупреждение!

Chinese.verse 50:1: 戛弗。以尊严的《古兰经》盟誓，
Chinese.verse 50:2: 难道他们因同族的警告者来临他们而惊讶吗？不信道的人们说：这是奇事！
Chinese.verse 50:3: 难道我们既死之么，已变尘土，还要还原吗？那太不近情理了。
Chinese.verse 50:4: 我确己知道大地对于他们的剥蚀，我这里有一本被保护的天经。
Chinese.verse 50:5: 他们否认已降示他们的真理，所以他们陷于混乱的状态中。
Chinese.verse 50:6: 难道他们没有仰观天体吗？我是怎样建造它，点缀它，使它没有缺陷的？
Chinese.verse 50:7: 我曾展开大地，并将许多山岳投在上面，还使各种美丽的植物生长出来，
Chinese.verse 50:8: 为的是启发和教诲每个归依的仆人。
Chinese.verse 50:9: 我从云中降下吉祥的雨水，就借它而生长许多果树和五谷，
Chinese.verse 50:10: 并生长扶疏的海枣树，它有累累的果实，
Chinese.verse 50:11: 用作众仆的给养。我借雨水而使它已死的地方复活。死人的复活也是这样的。
Chinese.verse 50:12: 在他们之前否认使者的人，在努哈的宗族、兰斯的居民、赛莫德人、
Chinese.verse 50:13: 阿德人、法老、鲁特的同胞、
Chinese.verse 50:14: 丛林的居民和图白的百姓，统统都否认过使者，故我所警告的刑罚，是必然降临的。
Chinese.verse 50:15: 我曾因创造而疲倦吗？不然，他们对于再造，是在疑惑中的。
Chinese.verse 50:16: 我确已创造人，我知道他心中的妄想；我比他的命脉还近于他。
Chinese.verse 50:17: 当坐在右边和左边的两个记录的天神记录各人的言行的时候，
Chinese.verse 50:18: 他每说一句话，他面前都有天神当场监察。
Chinese.verse 50:19: 临死的昏迷，将昭示真理。这是你一向所逃避的。
Chinese.verse 50:20: 号角将吹响，那是警告实现之日。
Chinese.verse 50:21: 每个人都要到来，驱逐的天神和见证的天神，将与他同行。
Chinese.verse 50:22: 你确忽视此事，现在我已揭开你的蒙蔽，所以你今日的眼光是锐利的。
Chinese.verse 50:23: 他的伙伴将说：这在我面前是现成的。
Chinese.verse 50:24: 你们俩所应当投入火狱的，是每个孤负者、顽固者、
Chinese.verse 50:26: 以别的神灵与真主同受崇拜者；你们俩将他投入严厉的刑罚吧！
Chinese.verse 50:27: 他的伙伴将说：我的主啊！我没有使他放荡，但他自陷于不近情理的迷误中。
Chinese.verse 50:28: 主将说：你们不要在我面前争论，我确已预先警告你们了。
Chinese.verse 50:29: 我的判词，是不可变更的，我绝不是亏枉众仆的。
Chinese.verse 50:30: 在那日，我将对火狱说：你已填满了吗？它将说：还有增加的吗？
Chinese.verse 50:31: 乐园将被移到敬畏者的附近，离得不远。
Chinese.verse 50:32: 这是你们所被应许的，这是赏赐每个归依的守礼者的。
Chinese.verse 50:33: 秘密敬畏至仁主，且带归依的心而来者，
Chinese.verse 50:34: 你们平安地进入乐园吧！这是永居开始之日。
Chinese.verse 50:35: 他们在乐园里，将有他们意欲的；而且我在那里还有加赐。
Chinese.verse 50:36: 在他们之前，我毁灭了许多比他们更强悍的世代！他们曾在各地旅行，难道有什么避死的地方吗？
Chinese.verse 50:37: 对于有心灵者，或专心静听者，此中确有一种教训。
Chinese.verse 50:38: 我在六日内确已创造了天地万物，我没有感觉一点疲倦。
Chinese.verse 50:39: 故你应当忍受他们所说的谰言。在日出和日落之前，你应当赞颂你的主；
Chinese.verse 50:40: 在夜间和叩头么，你应当赞颂他。
Chinese.verse 50:41: 你应当倾听，在喊叫者从近处喊叫之日，
Chinese.verse 50:42: 在他们听见包含真理的呐喊之日，那是从坟中出来之日。
Chinese.verse 50:43: 我确是使人生、使人死的，我确是最么的归宿。
Chinese.verse 50:44: 在大地破裂而他们迅速走出坟墓之日，那集合的事对于我是容易的。
Chinese.verse 50:45: 我全知他们所说的谰言，你不能强制他们，故你应当以《古兰经》教诲畏惧我的警告的人们。

Danish.verse 50:2: Maar zij verwonderen zich dat er uit e hun midden een waarschuwer tot hen kwam. En de ongelovigen zeggen: Dit is een zonderling iets
Danish.verse 50:3: Zullen wij in het leven worden geroepen wanneer wij dood gaan en stof zijn geworden? Zulk een terugkeer is onmogelijk
Danish.verse 50:4: Wij weten wat de aarde van hen verteert en bij Ons is een Boek dat alles bewaart
Danish.verse 50:5: Neen, zij hebben de Waarheid verloochend toen deze tot hen kwam, derhalve zijn zij in een verwarde toestand geraakt
Danish.verse 50:6: Zien zij niet naar de hemel boven hen hoe Wij deze hebben opgericht en versierd en dat dezelve geen gebreken heeft
Danish.verse 50:7: En de aarde - Wij hebben haar uitgespreid en stevige bergen er op gevestigd en Wij hebben er elk prachtig gewas op doen groeien
Danish.verse 50:8: Als inzicht en les voor iedere dienaar die zich er toe wendt
Danish.verse 50:9: En Wij zenden water vol zegeningen uit de hemel neder en Wij brengen daarmee tuinen en graan voort waarvan kan worden geoogst
Danish.verse 50:10: En hoge palmbomen met bloeikolve over elkander gegroeid
Danish.verse 50:11: Als voorziening voor Onze dienaren en Wij verkwikken daarmee een dood land. - Zo zal ook de Opstanding zijn
Danish.verse 50:12: Vóór hen verloochende ook het volk van Noach, de mensen van de Bron en het volk van Samoed
Danish.verse 50:13: Het volk van Aad, en Pharao en de broeders van Lot eveneens
Danish.verse 50:14: En de Bosbewoners, en het volk van Tobba, elk hunner verloochende de boodschapper. Daarom ging de bedreiging in vervulling
Danish.verse 50:15: Zijn Wij dan uitgeput door de eerste schepping? Neen, zij zijn in twijfel omtrent de nieuwe schepping
Danish.verse 50:16: En voorzeker, Wij hebben de mens geschapen en Wij weten alles wat zijn Ik hem toefluistert. En Wij zijn nader tot hem dan zijn halsader
Danish.verse 50:17: Wanneer de twee (engelen) die te boek stellen, schrijven, zit de een aan de rechter-, de andere aan de linkerzijde
Danish.verse 50:18: Hij uit geen woord of er is een bewaker bij hem, die altijd klaar staat
Danish.verse 50:19: En de bezwijming des doods komt waarlijk. Dit is hetgeen gij wildet ontvrluchten
Danish.verse 50:20: En er zal op de bazuin worden geblazen. Dit is de Dag der Bedreiging
Danish.verse 50:21: En iedere ziel zal tezamen komen met een geleider en een getuige
Danish.verse 50:22: Er zal worden gezegd: Gij waart hieromtrent achteloos. Nu hebben Wij uw sluier van u weggenomen en uw oog ziet deze Dag scherp
Danish.verse 50:23: En zijn metgezel zal zeggen: Dit is hetgeen bij mij gereed is
Danish.verse 50:24: Werpt, werpt in de hel elke ondankbare vijand
Danish.verse 50:25: Die het goede belette, de overtreder, de twijfelaar
Danish.verse 50:26: Die een andere God naast Allah oprichtte, doet hem de strenge marteling ondergaan
Danish.verse 50:27: Zijn metgezel zal zeggen: O, onze Heer, ik maakte hem niet opstandig maar hij was te ver afgedwaald
Danish.verse 50:28: God zal antwoorden: Redetwist niet in Mijn tegenwoordigheid, terwijl Ik u de waarschuwing vooraf heb gezonden
Danish.verse 50:29: Het vonnis door Mij geveld kan niet worden veranderd en Ik ben in het geheel niet onrechtvaardig jegens Mijn dienaren
Danish.verse 50:30: Op die Dag zullen Wij tot de hel zeggen: Zijt gij gevuld? En zij zal antwoorden: Is er nog iets
Danish.verse 50:31: En de Hemel zal dicht bij de rechtvaardigen worden gebracht en niet ver verwijderd
Danish.verse 50:32: Dit is hetgeen was beloofd voor een ieder die zich bekeerde en die waakzaam was
Danish.verse 50:33: Die de Barmhartige in het verborgene vreesde en met een berouwvol hart tot Hem kwam
Danish.verse 50:34: Gaat hier in vrede binnen. Dit is de Dag der Eeuwigheid
Danish.verse 50:35: Voor hen zal daarin zijn wat zij wensen en bij Ons is nog meer
Danish.verse 50:36: Maar hoevele geslachten hebben Wij (niet) vóór hen vernietigd, die machtiger in gezag waren dan dezen! Zij trokken door het land, maar was er een toevluchtsoord voor hen
Danish.verse 50:37: Daarin is voorwaar een vermaning voor hem die een hart heeft of die luistert en oplettend is
Danish.verse 50:38: En voorwaar, Wij schiepen de hemelen en de aarde en alles wat er tussen is in zes dagen en geen vermoeidheid raakte Ons
Danish.verse 50:39: Heb dus geduld met wat zij zeggen en verheerlijk uw Heer met de lof die Hem toekomt, vóór zonsop- en ondergang
Danish.verse 50:40: En verheerlijk Hem `s nachts en na de gebeden
Danish.verse 50:41: En luister! De Dag, waarop de omroeper vanuit een dichtbijzijnde plaats zal roepen
Danish.verse 50:42: De Dag, waarop zij de kreet in werkelijkheid zullen horen, dat zal de Tijd zijn van het voor den dag komen
Danish.verse 50:43: Voorwaar, Wij zijn het die leven geven en de dood veroorzaken, en tot Ons is de terugkeer
Danish.verse 50:44: De Dag, waarop de aarde onder hen vaneen zal splijten, is het verzamelen gemakkelijk voor Ons
Danish.verse 50:45: Wij weten het beste wat zij zeggen en gij zijt er niet om hen te dwingen. Vermaan dus met de Koran hem die Mijn bedreiging vreest

Dutch.verse 50:2: Zij zijn zelfs verbaasd dat er uit hun midden een waarschuwer tot hen is gekomen, zodat de ongelovigen zeggen: "Dat is een verbazingwekkende zaak!
Dutch.verse 50:3: Als wij gestorven zijn, en stof zijn geworden (worden wij dan weer opgewekt?) Dat is een onwaarschijnlijke terugkeer."
Dutch.verse 50:4: Waarlijk, Wij weten wat de aarde van hen zal wegnemen, en aan Onze Zijde is een Boek dat nauwkeurig bijgehouden wordt.
Dutch.verse 50:5: Zij loochenden zelfs de Waarheid toen die tot hen kwam, daarom nemen zij een verward standpunt in.
Dutch.verse 50:6: Kijken zij dan niet naar de hemel boven hen, hoe Wij die gebouwd hebben en hoe Wij die versierd hebben en hoe die geen enkele scheur heeft?
Dutch.verse 50:7: En hoe Wij de aarde uitgespreid hebben en Wij daarop stevige bergen geplaatst hebben en Wij daarop allerlei mooie gewassen deden groeien?
Dutch.verse 50:8: Als lering en herinnering voor iedere berouwvolle dienaar.
Dutch.verse 50:9: En Wij hebben uit de hemel gezegend water neer doen dalen, waarna Wij daarmee tuinen deden groeien en graan van oogstbare gewassen.
Dutch.verse 50:10: En rijzige dadelpalmen met boven elkaar gevoegde kolven.
Dutch.verse 50:11: Als een voorziening voor de dienaren. En Wij brengen daarmee (water) het dode land tot leven. Zo zal ook de Opwekking zijn.
Dutch.verse 50:12: Vóór hen loochende het volk van Nôeh, en de bewoners van Rass en de Tsamôed.
Dutch.verse 50:13: En de 'Ad, en Fir'aun en de broeders van Lôeth.
Dutch.verse 50:14: En de bewoners van Aikah en het volk van Toebba'. Allen loochenden de Boodschappers. Daarom was de bestraffing terecht.
Dutch.verse 50:15: Waren Wij dan niet in staat tot de eerste schepping? Zij verkeren beslist in twijfel over een nieuwe schepping.
Dutch.verse 50:16: En voorzeker, Wij hebben de mens geschapen en Wij weten wat zijn ziel hem influistert en Wij zijn dichter bij hem dan zijn halsslagader.
Dutch.verse 50:17: Wanneer de twee ontvangers (Engelen) aan de rechterzijde en aan de linkerzijde zitten te schrijven.
Dutch.verse 50:18: Is er geen woord dat Hij uit, of aan zijn Zijde bevindt zich een waker die gereed is.
Dutch.verse 50:19: En de doodsstrijd zal werkelijk komen, dat is waarvoor jullie proberen te vluchten.
Dutch.verse 50:20: En er zal op de bazuin geblazen worden. Dat is de Dag waarvoor gewaarschuwd is.
Dutch.verse 50:21: En elke ziel zal naar voren komen, met bij haar een (Engel als) voortdrijver en een (Engel als) getuige.
Dutch.verse 50:22: (Er wordt hem gezegd:) "Voorzeker, jij verkeerde hiervoor in onachtzaamheid, toen hieven Wij van jou de bedekking van jouw (hart) op, toen was jouw waarneming op deze Dag scherp."
Dutch.verse 50:23: En zijn metgezel (een Engel) zegt: "Dit is wat bij mij gereed is."
Dutch.verse 50:24: (Allah zegt tegen de twee Engelen:) "Werpt iedere opstandige ongelovige in de Hel.
Dutch.verse 50:25: Een tegenhouder van het goede, een overtreder een twijfelaar.
Dutch.verse 50:26: Degene die een andere god naast Allah nam: werpt hem daarom in de harde bestraffing."
Dutch.verse 50:27: En zijn metgezel (de Satan) zegt: "Onze Heer, ik heb hem niet tot dwaling gebracht; hij verkeerde zelf in vergaande dwaling."
Dutch.verse 50:28: Hij (Allah) zegt: "Redetwist niet in Mijn aanwezigheid, en Ik heb waarlijk een waarschuwing tot jullie gericht.
Dutch.verse 50:29: Het Woord van Mijn Zijde verandert niet en Ik ben niet onrechtvaardig jegens de dienaren."
Dutch.verse 50:30: (Gedenkt) de Dag dat Wij de Hel zeggen: "Ben jij al vol?" En zij zegt: "Is er nog meer?"
Dutch.verse 50:31: En het Paradijs zal dicht bij de Moettaqoen gebracht worden, zonder ver te zijn.
Dutch.verse 50:32: (Er wordt gezegd:) "Dit is wat jullie beloofd is, aan iedere berouwvolle, wakende.
Dutch.verse 50:33: Die de Barmhartige ongezien vreesde en die met een berouwvol hart kwam.
Dutch.verse 50:34: Treed haar binnen in vrede, dit is de Dag van de eeuwigheid."
Dutch.verse 50:35: Voor hen is daarin wat zij wensen en aan Onze Zijde is er nog meer.
Dutch.verse 50:36: En hoeveel generaties vóór hen hebben Wij niet vernietigd, die machtiger waren dan zij? Zij reisden toen in de landen, was er een kans om te vluchten?
Dutch.verse 50:37: Voorwaar, daarin is zeker een vermaning voor wie verstand heeft of wie luistert terwijl hij een getuige is.
Dutch.verse 50:38: En voorzeker, Wij hebben de hemelen en de aarde en wat ertussen is in zes dagen (perioden) geschapen, en vermoeienis raakte Ons niet.
Dutch.verse 50:39: Wees daarom geduldig met wat zij zeggen en prijs de Glorie met een lofprijzing van jouw Heer, vóór zonsopgang en vóór zonsondergang.
Dutch.verse 50:40: En prijs Hem in de nacht en na afloop van de neerknielingen (shalât).
Dutch.verse 50:41: En luister die Dag naar de roeper die vanaf een nabije plaats roept.
Dutch.verse 50:42: Op die Dag zullen zij het blazen (op de bazuin) in werkelijkheid horen. Dat is de Dag van de Opwekking.
Dutch.verse 50:43: Voorwaar, Wij doen leven en Wij doen sterven en tot Ons is de terugkeer.
Dutch.verse 50:44: Op de Dag waarop de aarde over hen gespleten zal worden, haasten (zij zich te verzamelen). Dat is een gemakkelijke verzameling voor Ons.
Dutch.verse 50:45: Wij weten het beste wat zij zeggen. En jij (Moehammad) bent niet als een dwinger over hen aangesteld. Vermaan daarom met de Koran degenen die Mijn Waarschuwing vrezen.

English.verse 50:2: But they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say, "This is an amazing thing.
English.verse 50:3: When we have died and have become dust, [we will return to life]? That is a distant return."
English.verse 50:4: We know what the earth diminishes of them, and with Us is a retaining record.
English.verse 50:5: But they denied the truth when it came to them, so they are in a confused condition.
English.verse 50:6: Have they not looked at the heaven above them - how We structured it and adorned it and [how] it has no rifts?
English.verse 50:7: And the earth - We spread it out and cast therein firmly set mountains and made grow therein [something] of every beautiful kind,
English.verse 50:8: Giving insight and a reminder for every servant who turns [to Allah].
English.verse 50:9: And We have sent down blessed rain from the sky and made grow thereby gardens and grain from the harvest
English.verse 50:10: And lofty palm trees having fruit arranged in layers -
English.verse 50:11: As provision for the servants, and We have given life thereby to a dead land. Thus is the resurrection.
English.verse 50:12: The people of Noah denied before them, and the companions of the well and Thamud
English.verse 50:13: And 'Aad and Pharaoh and the brothers of Lot
English.verse 50:14: And the companions of the thicket and the people of Tubba'. All denied the messengers, so My threat was justly fulfilled.
English.verse 50:15: Did We fail in the first creation? But they are in confusion over a new creation.
English.verse 50:16: And We have already created man and know what his soul whispers to him, and We are closer to him than [his] jugular vein
English.verse 50:17: When the two receivers receive, seated on the right and on the left.
English.verse 50:18: Man does not utter any word except that with him is an observer prepared [to record].
English.verse 50:19: And the intoxication of death will bring the truth; that is what you were trying to avoid.
English.verse 50:20: And the Horn will be blown. That is the Day of [carrying out] the threat.
English.verse 50:21: And every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness.
English.verse 50:22: [It will be said], "You were certainly in unmindfulness of this, and We have removed from you your cover, so your sight, this Day, is sharp."
English.verse 50:23: And his companion, [the angel], will say, "This [record] is what is with me, prepared."
English.verse 50:24: [Allah will say], "Throw into Hell every obstinate disbeliever,
English.verse 50:25: Preventer of good, aggressor, and doubter,
English.verse 50:26: Who made [as equal] with Allah another deity; then throw him into the severe punishment."
English.verse 50:27: His [devil] companion will say, "Our Lord, I did not make him transgress, but he [himself] was in extreme error."
English.verse 50:28: [Allah] will say, "Do not dispute before Me, while I had already presented to you the warning.
English.verse 50:29: The word will not be changed with Me, and never will I be unjust to the servants."
English.verse 50:30: On the Day We will say to Hell, "Have you been filled?" and it will say, "Are there some more,"
English.verse 50:31: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far,
English.verse 50:32: [It will be said], "This is what you were promised - for every returner [to Allah] and keeper [of His covenant]
English.verse 50:33: Who feared the Most Merciful unseen and came with a heart returning [in repentance].
English.verse 50:34: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity."
English.verse 50:35: They will have whatever they wish therein, and with Us is more.
English.verse 50:36: And how many a generation before them did We destroy who were greater than them in [striking] power and had explored throughout the lands. Is there any place of escape?
English.verse 50:37: Indeed in that is a reminder for whoever has a heart or who listens while he is present [in mind].
English.verse 50:38: And We did certainly create the heavens and earth and what is between them in six days, and there touched Us no weariness.
English.verse 50:39: So be patient, [O Muhammad], over what they say and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting,
English.verse 50:40: And [in part] of the night exalt Him and after prostration.
English.verse 50:41: And listen on the Day when the Caller will call out from a place that is near -
English.verse 50:42: The Day they will hear the blast [of the Horn] in truth. That is the Day of Emergence [from the graves].
English.verse 50:43: Indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is the destination
English.verse 50:44: On the Day the earth breaks away from them [and they emerge] rapidly; that is a gathering easy for Us.
English.verse 50:45: We are most knowing of what they say, and you are not over them a tyrant. But remind by the Qur'an whoever fears My threat.

Filipino.verse 50:1: Qaf (titik Q): Sa pamamagitan ng Maluwalhating Qur’an (ikaw o Muhammad ay tunay na Tagapagbalita ni Allah)
Filipino.verse 50:2: Datapuwa’t sila ay namangha nang dumatal sa kanilang lipon ang isang Tagapagbabala. Kaya’t ang mga hindi sumasampalataya ay nagsabi: “Ito ay isang kamangha- manghang bagay!”
Filipino.verse 50:3: “Ano? Na kung kami ay mamatay at maging abo, (kami ay muling mabubuhay?) Ito ay isang paraan ng Pagbabalik na malayo (sa aming pang-unawa).”
Filipino.verse 50:4: Talastas Namin kung ilan sa kanila ang kinuha (inilibing) ng lupa (na mga patay na katawan). At nasa Amin ang isang Talaan (na nag-iingat sa lahat ng pagsusulit)
Filipino.verse 50:5: Datapuwa’t itinatwa nila ang katotohanan (ang Qur’an) nang ito ay dumatal sa kanila, at sila ay nasa kalituhan (alalaong baga, hindi nila makilala ang pagkakaiba ng tumpak at mali)
Filipino.verse 50:6: Hindi baga sila nagmamasid sa alapaap (langit) sa kaitaasan? Kung paano Namin nilikha at ginayakan yaon, at doon ay walang anumang kasahulan
Filipino.verse 50:7: At ang kalupaan! Aming inilatag ito at nilagyan ng kabundukan na nakatayo nang matatag, at nagpatubo (Kami) rito ng lahat ng uri ng magagandang pananim (na magkakatambal)
Filipino.verse 50:8: Bilang pananaw at pagunita (paala-ala) sa bawat tagapaglingkod na nagbabalik-loob kay Allah (alalaong baga, siya na sumasampalataya kay Allah at gumagawa ng mga pagsunod sa Kanya at laging humihingi ng Kanyang kapatawaran)
Filipino.verse 50:9: At pinamalisbis Namin mula sa alapaap ang ulan na puno ng biyaya, at pinasibol Namin dito (sa kalupaan) ang mga halamanan at butil sa mga pag-aani
Filipino.verse 50:10: At matataas (at mabibikas) na punong palmera (datiles) na may mga piling na hitik sa bunga
Filipino.verse 50:11: Bilang mga pagkain at ikabubuhay ng mga tagapaglingkod (ni Allah); at ginawaran Namin ng (bagong) buhay ang patay (tigang) na lupa. Sa ganitong (paghahambing) ang Muling Pagkabuhay (ng patay)
Filipino.verse 50:12: Bago pa man sila, ay itinatwa na ng Pamayanan ni Noe, ng mga Kasamahan ni Rass, (ng tribu) ni Thamud (ang Kabilang Buhay)
Filipino.verse 50:13: Ni A’ad, Paraon, at mga kapatid ni Lut
Filipino.verse 50:14: At ng mga Naninirahan sa Kakahuyan, at ng pamayanan ng Tubba. Ang bawat isa sa kanila ay nagtakwil sa (kanilang) mga Tagapagbalita, kaya’t ang Aking Babala ay ipinatupad sa kanila
Filipino.verse 50:15: Kami (Allah) baga ay napagal sa Aming Unang Paglikha, at sila ay naguguluhan at nag-aalinlangan sa bagong Paglikha (alalaong baga, ang Muling Pagkabuhay)
Filipino.verse 50:16: At katotohanang Kami ang lumikha sa tao, at batid Namin kung ano ang ibinubulong ng kanyang kaluluwa; sapagkat higit Kaming malapit sa kanya (sa Aming karunungan) kaysa sa kanyang ugat sa leeg
Filipino.verse 50:17: Pagmasdan ang dalawang (nagbabantay na anghel ) na nakatalaga upang maalaman (ang kanyang mga gawa), mabatid (at maitala ito). Isa ang nakaupo sa kanan at isa sa kaliwa
Filipino.verse 50:18: walang isa mang salita na kanyang usalin ang makakahulagpos sa matamang Tagapagbantay
Filipino.verse 50:19: At ang pagkabaghan (pagkatuliro) sa kamatayan ay daratal sa katotohanan. “Ito ang bagay na pinagsusumikapan mong takasan!”
Filipino.verse 50:20: At ang Tambuli ay hihipan. Ito ang Araw na ang Babala ay iginawad (alalaong baga, ang Araw ng Muling Pagkabuhay)
Filipino.verse 50:21: At ang bawat kaluluwa ay magsisilapit; na sa bawat isa ay (may anghel) na humihila at (anghel) na nagbibigay patotoo
Filipino.verse 50:22: (At sa makasalanan ay ipagsasaysay ): “Katotohanang ikaw ay hindi nakinig dito, ngayon ay Aming tinanggal ang iyong lambong, at higit na matalim ang iyong paningin sa Araw na ito!”
Filipino.verse 50:23: At ang kanyang kasamang (anghel) ay magsasabi: “Narito sa akin ang Talaan na laging nakahanda!”
Filipino.verse 50:24: (At ang kahatulan ay ito:) “Kayong dalawa (mga anghel), inyong itapon sa Impiyerno ang bawat isang matigas ang ulo na walang pananalig (sa Kaisahan ni Allah, sa Kanyang mga Tagapagbalita, atbp.)!”
Filipino.verse 50:25: “ Na nagbabawal sa mga mabubuti, na nagmalabis sa hangganan (ng pagsuway ), at nag-aalinlangan
Filipino.verse 50:26: Na nagtitindig ng iba pang diyos bilang katambal ni Allah, siya ay kapwa ninyo (ang mga anghel) itapon sa Kasakit-sakit na Kaparusahan.”
Filipino.verse 50:27: Ang kanyang kasama (si Satanas) ay magsasabi: “Aming Panginoon! Siya ay hindi ko itinulak na magmalabis sa pagsuway (kawalan ng pananalig, pang-aapi, kabuktutan), datapuwa’t siya (sa kanyang sarili) ay nasa kamalian at pagkaligaw na malayo.”
Filipino.verse 50:28: Si Allah ay magwiwika: “Huwag kayong magtalo sa Aking Harapan. Noon pa mang una, Ako ay nagparating na sa inyo ng Babala.”
Filipino.verse 50:29: “Ang Aking Salita ay hindi magbabago, at Ako ay hindi maggagawad ng kahit isa mang katiting ng di katarungan sa Aking mga alipin”
Filipino.verse 50:30: Sa Araw na Aming tatanungin ang Impiyerno:, “Ikaw baga ay nalalagyan na ng husto?” Ito ay magsasabi: “ Mayroon pa bang ibang darating?”
Filipino.verse 50:31: At ang Halamanan (Paraiso) ay itatambad nang malapit sa Muttaqun (mga matutuwid at matimtimang tao na umiiwas sa lahat ng mga ipinagbabawal at sumusunod sa lahat ng mga ipinag-uutos ni Allah)
Filipino.verse 50:32: (At dito ay ipagbabadya): “ Ito ang ipinangako sa inyo, (ito ay para) sa kanila na lagi nang nagbabalik-loob (kay Allah) sa taos na pagsisisi at nagpapanatili sa kanilang kasunduan kay Allah (sa pagsunod sa Kanya sa lahat ng Kanyang ipinag-utos at sumasamba lamang sa Kanya)
Filipino.verse 50:33: “ Na nangangamba sa Pinakamapagbigay (Allah) sa Ghaib (Lingid) [alalaong baga, sa buhay sa mundong ito bago ang pagkikita at pakikipagtipan sa Kanya, at nag-aalay ng puso na sagana sa debosyon (sa Kanya)]”
Filipino.verse 50:34: “ Magsipasok kayo rito sa kapayapaan at kapanatagan; ito ang Araw ng walang Hanggang Buhay!”
Filipino.verse 50:35: Matatamasa nila rito ang lahat nilang ninanais, at mayroon pang ibang nakalaan na nasa Amin
Filipino.verse 50:36: Ngunit ilan na bang mga lahi ang winasak Namin nang una pa rito (dahilan sa kanilang kabuktutan), na higit na malakas sa kapangyarihan sa kanila? (At nang ang Kaparusahan ay dumatal), sila ay nagsipamayagpag sa kalupaan (upang maghanap ng kanlungan)! Makakatagpo ba sila ng anumang pook ng kanlungan (upang iligtas ang kanilang sarili sa pagkawasak)
Filipino.verse 50:37: Katotohanang naririto ang isang tiyak na Paala-ala sa sinuman na may puso at pang-unawa o siya na dumirinig at isang saksi
Filipino.verse 50:38: Katotohanang nilikha Namin ang kalangitan at kalupaan at lahat ng nasa pagitan nito sa anim na araw, at walang anumang pagkapagal ang nakapanaig sa Amin
Filipino.verse 50:39: Kaya’t iyong pagtiisan (O Muhammad) ang lahat nilang sinasabi, at ipagbunyi mo ang mga pagpupuri sa iyong Panginoon, bago dumatal ang pagbubukang liwayway at bago kumagat ang dilim (alalaong baga, ang pang-umaga, pangtanghali at panghapong panalangin - Fajr, Dhuhur at Asr)
Filipino.verse 50:40: At (gayundin) sa mga bahagi ng gabi, ipagbunyi ang Kanyang mga papuri (alalaong baga, ang pangtakipsilim at panggabing panalangin – Maghrib at Isha), (at gayundin naman) pagkatapos ng pagpapatirapa (sa pananalangin), [katulad halimbawa ng pagdalit ng isang daang beses ng Subhan Allah, Alhamdu lillah, Allahu Akbar]
Filipino.verse 50:41: At pakinggan sa Araw (na yaon) kung ang Tagatawag ay tumawag na sa isang pook na lubhang malapit
Filipino.verse 50:42: Sa Araw na sila ay makakarinig ng (malakas) na Pagsambulat na (walang pagsala), at sa katotohanan (alalaong baga, ang paglabas ng mga tao sa kanilang libingan), ito ang Araw ng Muling Pagkabuhay
Filipino.verse 50:43: Katotohanang Kami ang naggagawad ng Buhay at nagkakaloob ng Kamatayan; at sa Amin ang Huling Pagbabalik
Filipino.verse 50:44: Sa Araw na ang Kalupaan ay malalansag (sa pagkabiyak), na hinahayaan sila na nagmamadali sa paglabas: ito ang takdang pagtitipon na lubhang magaan sa Amin
Filipino.verse 50:45: Labis Naming nababatid ang kanilang sinasabi; at ikaw (o Muhammad) ay hindi (siyang) makakapagpasunod nang sapilitan sa kanila (upang manampalataya). Kaya’t pagtagubilinan mo sila sa pamamagitan ng Qur’an na pangambahan nila ang Aking Babala

French.verse 50:2: Mais ils s'étonnent que l'un des leurs leur vint comme avertisseur; et les mécréants dirent: «Ceci est une chose étonnante.
French.verse 50:3: Quoi! Quand nous serons morts et réduits en poussière...? Ce serait revenir de loin!»
French.verse 50:4: Certes, Nous savons ce que la terre rongera d'eux [de leurs corps]; et Nous avons un Livre où tout est conservé.
French.verse 50:5: Plutôt, ils traitent de mensonge la vérité qui leur est venue: les voilà donc dans une situation confuse.
French.verse 50:6: N'ont-ils donc pas observé le ciel au-dessus d'eux, comment Nous l'avons bâti et embelli; et comment il est sans fissures?
French.verse 50:7: Et la terre, Nous l'avons étendue et Nous y avons enfoncé fermement des montagnes et y avons fait pousser toutes sortes de magnifiques couples de [végétaux],
French.verse 50:8: à titre d'appel à la clairvoyance et un rappel pour tout serviteur repentant.
French.verse 50:9: Et Nous avons fait descendre du ciel une eau bénie, avec laquelle Nous avons fait pousser des jardins et le grain qu'on moissonne,
French.verse 50:10: ainsi que les hauts palmiers aux régimes superposés,
French.verse 50:11: comme subsistance pour les serviteurs. Et par elle (l'eau) Nous avons redonné la vie à une contrée morte. Ainsi se fera la résurrection.
French.verse 50:12: Avant eux, le peuple de Noé, les gens d'Ar-Rass et les Thamûd crièrent au mensonge,
French.verse 50:13: de même que les 'Aad et Pharaon et les frères de Lot,
French.verse 50:14: et les gens d'Al-Aykah et le peuple de Tubba'. Tous traitèrent les Messagers de menteurs. C'est ainsi que Ma menace se justifia.
French.verse 50:15: Quoi? Avons-Nous été fatigué par la première création? Mais ils sont dans la confusion [au sujet] d'une création nouvelle.
French.verse 50:16: Nous avons effectivement créé l'homme et Nous savons ce que son âme lui suggère et Nous sommes plus près de lui que sa veine jugulaire
French.verse 50:17: quand les deux recueillants, assis à droite et à gauche, recueillent.
French.verse 50:18: Il ne prononce pas une parole sans avoir auprès de lui un observateur prêt à l'inscrire.
French.verse 50:19: L'agonie de la mort fait apparaître la vérité: «Voilà ce dont tu t'écartais».
French.verse 50:20: Et l'on soufflera dans la Trompe: Voilà le jour de la Menace.
French.verse 50:21: Alors chaque âme viendra accompagnée d'un conducteur et d'un témoin.
French.verse 50:22: «Tu restais indifférent à cela. Et bien, Nous ôtons ton voile; ta vue est perçante aujourd'hui.
French.verse 50:23: Et son compagnon dira: «Voilà ce qui est avec moi, tout prêt».
French.verse 50:24: «Vous deux, jetez dans l'Enfer tout mécréant endurci et rebelle,
French.verse 50:25: acharné à empêcher le bien, transgresseur, douteur,
French.verse 50:26: celui qui plaçait à côté d'Allah une autre divinité. Jetez-le donc dans le dur châtiment».
French.verse 50:27: Son camarade (le Diable) dira: «Seigneur, ce n'est pas moi qui l'ai fait transgresser; mais il était déjà dans un profond égarement».
French.verse 50:28: Alors [Allah] dira:«Ne vous disputez pas devant moi! Alors que Je vous ai déjà fait part de la menace.
French.verse 50:29: Chez Moi, la parole ne change pas; et Je n'opprime nullement les serviteurs».
French.verse 50:30: Le jour où Nous dirons à l'Enfer; «Es-tu rempli?» Il dira: «Y en a-t-il encore?»
French.verse 50:31: Le Paradis sera rapproché à proximité des pieux.
French.verse 50:32: «Voilà ce qui vous a été promis, [ainsi qu'] à tout homme plein de repentir et respectueux [des prescriptions divines]
French.verse 50:33: qui redoute le Tout Miséricordieux bien qu'il ne Le voit pas, et qui vient [vers Lui] avec un cœur porté à l'obéissance.
French.verse 50:34: Entrez-y en toute sécurité,». Voilà le jour de l'éternité!
French.verse 50:35: Il y aura là pour eux tout ce qu'ils voudront. Et auprès de Nous il y a davantage encore.
French.verse 50:36: combien avons-Nous fait périr, avant eux, de générations bien plus fortes qu'eux. Ils avaient parcouru les contrées, cherchant [vainement] où fuir.
French.verse 50:37: Il y a bien là un rappel pour quiconque a un cœur, prête l'oreille tout en étant témoin.
French.verse 50:38: En effet Nous avons créé les cieux et la terre et ce qui existe entre eux en six jours, sans éprouver la moindre lassitude.
French.verse 50:39: Endure donc ce qu'ils disent; et célèbre la louange de ton Seigneur avant le lever du soleil et avant [son] coucher;
French.verse 50:40: et célèbre Sa gloire, une partie de la nuit et à la suite des prosternations [prières].
French.verse 50:41: Et sois à l'écoute, le jour où le Crieur criera d'un endroit proche,
French.verse 50:42: le jour où ils entendront en toute vérité le Cri. Voilà le Jour de la Résurrection.
French.verse 50:43: C'est Nous qui donnons la vie et donnons la mort, et vers Nous sera la destination,
French.verse 50:44: le jour où la terre se fendra, les [rejetant] précipitamment. Ce sera un rassemblement facile pour Nous.
French.verse 50:45: Nous savons mieux ce qu'ils disent. Tu n'as pas pour mission d'exercer sur eux une contrainte. Rappelle donc, par le Coran celui qui craint Ma menace.

Fulah.verse 50:1: Qaaf. Mi woondirii Alqur`aanaare teddunde nden
Fulah.verse 50:2: Si ko woni, ɓe ŋalɗu ko tawi kon jertinoowo arii ɓe iwɗo e maɓɓe ; heeferɓe ɓen wi`i: "Ɗum ɗoo ko huunde haawniinde
Fulah.verse 50:3: Kere si men maayii, men wontii mbulmbuldi...? Ɗum ɗon ko ruttitagol woɗɗungol non
Fulah.verse 50:4: Gomɗii Meɗen anndi ko leydi ndin ñaamata kon e maɓɓe ; hino ka Amen gaa deftere reenunde
Fulah.verse 50:5: Si ko woni, ɓe fennu goonga kan tuma nde ka arunoo e maɓɓe, hiɓe e nder fiyaaku jilɓuɗo
Fulah.verse 50:6: E ɓee ndaaraali kammu ngun dow maɓɓe, ko honno Men mahiri ngun Men cuɗini ngu ; hara perɗi alanaa ngu
Fulah.verse 50:7: Leydi ndin kadi, Men weerti ndi Men werlii e mayri pelle, Men fuɗini e mayri kala nooneeji [puɗi] wooɗuɗi
Fulah.verse 50:8: fii tasakuyee e waaju wonannde kala jeyaaɗo ruttotooɗo
Fulah.verse 50:9: Men jippini kadi ndiyam barkinaaɗam ummaade ka kammu, Men fuɗiniri ɗam gese e gabbe soñeteeɗe
Fulah.verse 50:10: e leɗɗe tamaro juutuɗe wonduɗe e piindi fawondirndi
Fulah.verse 50:11: ko arsike jeyaaɓe ɓen. Men wuurnitiri ɗam kadi leydi yoorundi. Awa ko non woni fii ummital ngal
Fulah.verse 50:12: Ado maɓɓe, yimɓe nuuhu ɓen, e yimɓe Ɓunndu ɓen e Samuuda’en [fow] fennuno
Fulah.verse 50:13: e ’Aadi’en, e Fir`awna e musiɗɓe Luutu ɓen
Fulah.verse 50:14: e yimɓe fitaare nden, e yimɓe Tubba’ ɓen. Kala maɓɓe fennuno Nulaaɓe ɓen, kammbaa Am on jojji
Fulah.verse 50:15: Kere Men ronkuno fii tagu aranu ngun? Ko woni kamɓe, hiɓe e jiɓaare fii tagiteede laawol kesol
Fulah.verse 50:16: Gomɗii Men tagii neɗɗanke on, Meɗen anndi ko wonkii makko kin sowinsinirta mo. Ko Menen ɓuri ɓadaade mo e dii ɗaɗol (makko) daande ngol
Fulah.verse 50:17: tuma nde jaɓɓoytooɓe ɓen ɗiɗo jaɓɓoroytoo [golle makko ɗen] ñaamo e nano, hara hiɓe jooɗii
Fulah.verse 50:18: O wowlataa konngol, si wanaa hino takko makko winndoowo tawaaɗo
Fulah.verse 50:19: Ɗeɗɗere maayde nden ardi e goonga : "Ko ɗum wonunoo ko dogaynoɗaa
Fulah.verse 50:20: Wuttee ka alaandu ; ko nden woni Ñalaande kammbaa nden
Fulah.verse 50:21: Wonkii kala ara, hara hiki wonndi e soggoowo e seedotooɗo
Fulah.verse 50:22: Gomɗii a laatinoke welsindiiɗo e ndee. Men hunci wirngallo maa ngon kisan; gite maa ɗen hannde ko seeɓuɗe
Fulah.verse 50:23: Wonndiiɗo makko on wi`a: "Ko ɗum ɗoo woni ka am ɗoo, maandinaa-ɗum
Fulah.verse 50:24: Bugee ka Jahannama onon ɗiɗo, kala yedduɗo canndallo
Fulah.verse 50:26: on waɗiduɗo e Allah reweteeɗo goo. Bugee mo ka nder lepte saɗtuɗe
Fulah.verse 50:27: Cinndadiijo makko (seytaane) on wi`i: "Joomi amen, mi bewinaali oo; si ko woni, ko e majjere woɗɗunde o wonunoo e mun
Fulah.verse 50:28: [Allah] daala : "Wata on yeddondir ka Am ɗoo ! Nde tawnoo Mi ardiniino e mon kammbaa
Fulah.verse 50:29: Konngol waɗtitetaake ka Am ɗoo ; Mi siforaa kadi tooñoowo jeyaaɓe ɓen
Fulah.verse 50:30: Ñalnde Men wi`anoyta Jahannama on : "E a heewii?" Nge wi`a: "Ko ɓeydee hino woodi
Fulah.verse 50:31: Aljanna on ɓaɗtinanee gomɗuɓe ɓen, hara wanaa ka woɗɗi
Fulah.verse 50:32: Ko ɗum ɗoo woni ko fodaɗon, wonannde kala ruttiiɗo [e Joomi mun] reeniiɗo
Fulah.verse 50:33: on huluɗo Jom Hinaranke On ka wirnii, o ardi e ɓernde laaɓunde
Fulah.verse 50:34: Naatiree mo e jam". Ko nden woni ñalaande luttaynde nden
Fulah.verse 50:35: Hino woodani ɓe ton kala ko ɓe faaletee, hara kadi ɓeydaari hino ka Amen
Fulah.verse 50:36: Ɗuuɗii e gire ɗen Men halki ado maɓɓe, ko ɓen ɓurnooɓe doole, ɓen wanngorii e leydi ndin, ndaarugol taw si ɓe heɓay laaworde
Fulah.verse 50:37: Pellet, wonii e ɗum, waaju wonannde kala jom ɓernde, maa tuɗuɗo noppi hara ko tawaaɗo
Fulah.verse 50:38: Gomɗii Men tagii kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin e kon ko woni hakkunde majji, nder balɗe jeegoo, tampere woo heɓaali Men. @Corrected
Fulah.verse 50:39: Muñño e ko ɓe wowlata kon, subbunhinanoɗaa Joomi maa ado puɗal naange ngen e ado mutal ngal
Fulah.verse 50:40: Jemma on kadi, subbunhinanoɗaa Mo e ka battane [julɗe] farlaaɗe
Fulah.verse 50:41: Heɗo, ñalnde noddoowo on noddoyta e nokkuure ɓadiinde
Fulah.verse 50:42: ñalnde ɓe naniroyta haacaango ngon e hoore goonga. Ko nden woni Ñalnnde yaltugol ngol [ka genaale]
Fulah.verse 50:43: Pellet, ko Menen wuurnata Men wara, ko ka Amen kadi woni ruttorde nden
Fulah.verse 50:44: Ñalnde leydi ndin seekotoo [ɓe yaltira] heñagol; ko nde woni mooɓirde newaniinde Men
Fulah.verse 50:45: Ko Menen ɓuri anndude ko ɓe wowlata kon. A wonaa dooloowoɓe. Haray waajor Alqur`aanaare nden, kala huloowo kammbaa An on

German.verse 50:2: Aber nein! Sie wundern sich darüber, daß ein Überbringer von Warnungen von ihnen selbst zu ihnen gekommen ist. Da sagen die Ungläubigen: "Das ist eine verwunderliche Sache.
German.verse 50:3: Wenn wir gestorben und zu Erde geworden sind ... (, sollten wir dann wirklich wieder auferstehen)? Das ist doch eine weitentfernte Rückkehr."
German.verse 50:4: Wir wissen bestimmt, was die Erde von ihnen verringert. Und bei Uns ist ein Buch, das alles bewahrt.
German.verse 50:5: Aber nein! Sie haben die Wahrheit für Lüge erklärt, als sie zu ihnen gekommen ist, und so befinden sie sich (stets) in Unbeständigkeit.
German.verse 50:6: Schauen sie denn nicht zum Himmel über ihnen, wie Wir ihn aufgebaut und geschmückt haben, und daß er keine Spalten hat?
German.verse 50:7: Und die Erde haben Wir gedehnt und darauf festgegründete Berge gesetzt, und Wir haben auf ihr von jeder entzückenden (Pflanzen)art wachsen lassen,
German.verse 50:8: zur Einsicht und Ermahnung für jeden reuigen Diener.
German.verse 50:9: Und Wir lassen vom Himmel gesegnetes Wasser herabkommen, womit Wir dann Gärten und Korn, das man erntet, wachsen lassen,
German.verse 50:10: und Palmen, hochreichend und mit übereinander gereihten Blütenkolben,
German.verse 50:11: als Versorgung für die Diener. Und Wir machen damit (manch) totes Land wieder lebendig; so wird auch das Herauskommen (erfolgen).
German.verse 50:12: Der Lüge bezichtigten vor ihnen das Volk Nuhs und die Leute von ar-Rass und die Tamud
German.verse 50:13: und die 'Ad und Fir'aun und die Brüder Luts
German.verse 50:14: und die Bewohner des Dickichts und das Volk Tubba's. Alle bezichtigten die Gesandten der Lüge, so ist Meine Androhung unvermeidlich fällig geworden.
German.verse 50:15: Ermüdeten Wir denn durch die erste Erschaffung? Nein! Vielmehr ist ihnen verdeckt (geblieben), was eine neue Erschaffung betrifft.
German.verse 50:16: Wir haben ja den Menschen erschaffen und wissen, was (alles ihm) seine Seele einflüstert, und Wir sind ihm doch näher als seine Halsschlagader,
German.verse 50:17: wo die beiden Empfänger (der Taten) empfangen, zur Rechten und zur Linken sitzend.
German.verse 50:18: Kein Wort äußert er, ohne daß bei ihm ein Beobachter bereit wäre.
German.verse 50:19: Und es wird die Trunkenheit des Todes mit der Wahrheit kommen: "Das ist das, wovor du auszuweichen pflegtest."
German.verse 50:20: Und es wird ins Horn geblasen; das ist der angedrohte Tag.
German.verse 50:21: Und jede Seele wird kommen und mit ihr ein Treiber und ein Zeuge.
German.verse 50:22: "Du warst dessen ja unachtsam. Nun haben Wir deine Decke von dir hinweggenommen, so daß dein Blick heute scharf ist."
German.verse 50:23: Und sein Geselle wird sagen: "Das ist, was bei mir bereit ist."
German.verse 50:24: - "Werft, ihr beide, in die Hölle jeden beharrlichen, widerspenstigen Ungläubigen,
German.verse 50:25: Verweigerer des Guten, der Übertretungen begeht und sich in starkem Zweifel befindet,
German.verse 50:26: der neben Allah einen anderen Gott setzt. So werft ihn in die strenge Strafe."
German.verse 50:27: Sein Geselle wird sagen: "Unser Herr, ich habe ihn nicht zu einem Übermaß (an Frevel) verleitet, sondern er (selbst) befand sich in tiefem Irrtum."
German.verse 50:28: Er (Allah) wird sagen: "Streitet nicht miteinander vor Mir, wo Ich euch doch die Androhung vorausgeschickt habe.
German.verse 50:29: Das Wort wird bei Mir nicht abgeändert, und Ich bin keiner, der den Dienern Unrecht zufügt."
German.verse 50:30: Am Tag, da Wir zur Hölle sagen werden: "Bist du voll geworden?", und sie sagt: "Gibt es denn noch mehr?"
German.verse 50:31: Und nahe herangebracht wird der (Paradies)garten an die Gottesfürchtigen, gar nicht fern:
German.verse 50:32: "Das ist, was euch versprochen worden ist, (versprochen) für jeden immer wieder Umkehrbereiten und (Allahs Gebote) Hütenden,
German.verse 50:33: der den Allerbarmer im verborgenen fürchtet und mit reuigem Herzen (zu Ihm) kommt.
German.verse 50:34: Betretet ihn in Frieden. Das ist der Tag der Ewigkeit."
German.verse 50:35: Sie werden, was sie wollen, darin haben. Und bei Uns ist noch mehr.
German.verse 50:36: Wie viele Geschlechter vernichteten Wir vor ihnen, die eine stärkere Gewalt hatten als sie und in den Landstrichen umherzogen! Gibt es denn ein Entrinnen?
German.verse 50:37: Darin ist wahrlich eine Ermahnung für jemanden, der Herz hat oder hinhört, während er (geistig) anwesend ist.
German.verse 50:38: Und Wir haben ja die Himmel und die Erde und das, was dazwischen ist, in sechs Tagen erschaffen, wobei Uns keine Ermüdung überkommen hat.
German.verse 50:39: So ertrage standhaft, was sie sagen, und lobpreise deinen Herrn vor dem Aufgang der Sonne und vor dem Untergang,
German.verse 50:40: und (in einem Teil) von der Nacht, da preise Ihn, und am Ende der Niederwerfung.
German.verse 50:41: Und höre zu am Tag, da der Rufer von einem nahen Ort aus ruft,
German.verse 50:42: am Tag, da sie den Schrei in Wahrheit hören werden; das ist der Tag des Herauskommens.
German.verse 50:43: Gewiß, Wir sind es, die Wir wieder lebendig machen und sterben lassen, und zu Uns ist der Ausgang.
German.verse 50:44: - Am Tag, da die Erde, sie freilassend, sich ihnen aufspalten wird und sie eilig (hervorkommen). Das ist für Uns ein leichtes Versammeln.
German.verse 50:45: Wir wissen sehr wohl, was sie sagen, und du bist nicht als Gewalthaber über sie (eingesetzt). Darum ermahne (nur) mit dem Qur'an (jeden,) wer Meine Androhung fürchtet.

Hausa.verse 50:1: ¡̃. Inã rantsuwa da Alƙur'ãni Mai girma.
Hausa.verse 50:2: Ã'a, sun yi mãmãki, cewa mai gargaɗi, daga gare su, yã zo musu, sai kãfirai suka ce: "Wannan wani abu ne mai ban mãmãki."
Hausa.verse 50:3: "Shin idan muka mutu kuma muka kasance turɓãya (zã a kõmo da mu)? Waccan kõmowa ce mai nĩsa."
Hausa.verse 50:4: Lalle ne Mun san abin da ƙasã ke ragẽwo daga gare su, kuma wurinMu akwai wani littãfi mai tsarẽwa.
Hausa.verse 50:5: Ã'a, sun ƙaryata ne game da gaskiyar a lõkacin da ta je musu, sabõda haka sunã a cikin wani al'amari mai raurawa.
Hausa.verse 50:6: Shin, to, ba su yi dubi ba zuwa ga samã a bisa gare su, yadda Muka gĩna ta, kuma Muka ƙawãce ta, kuma bã ta da waɗansu tsãgogi?
Hausa.verse 50:7: Da ƙasã, Mun mĩƙe ta, kuma Mun jẽfa kafaffun duwãtsu a cikinta, kuma Mun tsirar, a cikinta daga kõwane ma'auri mai ban sha'awa?
Hausa.verse 50:8: Dõmin wãyar da ido da tunãtarwa ga dukan bãwa mai tawakkali?
Hausa.verse 50:9: Kuma Mun sassakar, daga samã ruwa mai albarka sa'an nan Muka tsirar game da shi (itãcen) lambuna da ƙwãya abin girbẽwa.
Hausa.verse 50:10: Da itãcen dabĩno dõgãye, sunã da'ya'yan itãce gunda mãsu hauhawar jũna.
Hausa.verse 50:11: Dõmin arziki ga bãyi, kuma Muka rãyar da ƙasa matacciya game da shi. Kamar wannan ne fitar daga kabari kake.
Hausa.verse 50:12: Mutãnen Nũhu sun ƙaryata, a gabãninsu (mutãnen yanzu) da ma'abũta Rassi, da Samũdãwa.
Hausa.verse 50:13: Da Ãdãwa da Fir'auna da 'yan'uwan Lũɗu.
Hausa.verse 50:14: Da ma'abũta ƙunci da mutãnen Tubba'u, kõwanensu ya ƙaryata Manzanni, sai ƙyacẽwaTa ta tabbata.
Hausa.verse 50:15: Shin, to, Mun kãsa ne game da halittar farko? Ã'a, su sunã a cikin rikici daga halitta sãbuwa.
Hausa.verse 50:16: Kuma lalle ne haƙĩƙa Mun halitta mutum kuma Mun san abin da ransa ke yin waswãsi da shi, kuma Mũ ne mafi kusanta zuwa gare shi daga lakar jannayẽnsa.
Hausa.verse 50:17: A lõkacin da mãsu haɗuwa biyu suke haɗuwa daga dãma, kuma daga hagu akwai wani (malã'ika) zaunanne.
Hausa.verse 50:18: Bã ya lafazi da wata magana fãce a lĩƙe da shi akwai mai tsaro halartacce.
Hausa.verse 50:19: Kuma mãyen mutuwa ya jẽ da gaskiya. Wannan shĩ ne abin da ka kasance daga gare shi kanã bijirẽwa.
Hausa.verse 50:20: Kuma aka hũra a cikin ƙaho. Wancan yinin ƙyacẽwar ne fa.
Hausa.verse 50:21: Kuma kõwane rai ya zo, tãre da shi akwai mai kõra da mai shaida.
Hausa.verse 50:22: (Sai a ce masa): "Lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, ka kasance a cikin gafala daga wannan. To, Mun kuranye maka rufinka, sabõda haka ganinka a yau, mai kaifi ne."
Hausa.verse 50:23: Kuma abõkin haɗinsa ya ce: "Wannan shi ne abin da ke tãre da ni halarce."
Hausa.verse 50:24: (A ce wa Malã'iku), "Ku jẽfa, a cikin Jahannama, dukan mai yawan kãfirci, mai tsaurin rai."
Hausa.verse 50:25: "Mai yawan hanãwa ga alhẽri, mai zãlunci, mai shakka."
Hausa.verse 50:26: "Wanda ya sanya, tãre da Allah wani abin bautãwa na dabam, sabõda haka kujẽfa shi a cikin azãba mai tsanani."
Hausa.verse 50:27: Abõkin haɗinsa ya ce: "Ya Ubangijinmu! Ban sanya shi girman kai ba, kuma amma ya kasance a cikin ɓata mai nĩsa."
Hausa.verse 50:28: Ya ce: "Kada ku yi husũma a wuriNa, alhãli Na gabãtar da ƙyacewa zuwa gare ku."
Hausa.verse 50:29: "Ba a musanya magana a wuriNa, Kuma Ban zama Mai zãlunci ba ga bãyiNa."
Hausa.verse 50:30: Rãnar da Muke cẽwa ga Jahannama "Shin, kin cika?" Kuma ta ce: "Ashe, akwai wani ƙãri?"
Hausa.verse 50:31: Kuma a kusantar dã Aljanna ga mãsu taƙawa, ba da nĩsa ba.
Hausa.verse 50:32: "Wannan shĩ ne abin da ake yi muku wa'adi da shi ga dukan mai yawan kõmawa ga Allah, mai tsarewar (umurninSa).
Hausa.verse 50:33: "Wanda ya ji tsõron Mai rahama a fake, kuma ya zo da wata irin zũciya mai tawakkali."
Hausa.verse 50:34: (A ce musu) "Ku shige ta da aminci, waccan ita ce rãnar dawwama."
Hausa.verse 50:35: Sunã da abin da suke so a cikinta, kuma tãre da Mũ akwai ƙãrin ni'ima,
Hausa.verse 50:36: Kuma da yawa Muka halakar, a gabãninsu, (mutãnen yanzu) ɗaga waɗansu al'ummomi, (waɗanda suke) sũ ne mafi ƙarfin damƙa daga gare su, sa'an nan suka yi bincike a cikin ƙasãshe: 'Kõ akwai wurin tsĩra'? (Babu).
Hausa.verse 50:37: Lalle ne, a cikin wancan, akwai tunãtarwa ga wanda zũciyarsa ta kasance gare shi, kõ kuwa ya jẽfa saurãro, alhãli kuwa yanã halarce (da hankalinsa).
Hausa.verse 50:38: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Mun halitta sammai da ƙasã da abin da ke a tsakãninsu, a cikin kwãnaki shida, alhãli wata'yar wahala ba ta shãfe Mu ba.
Hausa.verse 50:39: Sabõda haka, ka yi haƙuri a kan abin da suke fadã, kuma ka yi tasĩhi game da gõdẽ wa Ubangijinka (watau ka yi salla) a gabãnin fitõwar rãnã da gabãnin ɓacẽwarta.
Hausa.verse 50:40: Kuma daga dare, sai ka yi tasbĩhi a gare Shi da bãyan sujada.
Hausa.verse 50:41: Kuma ka saurãra a rãnar da mai kira ke yin kira daga wuri makusanci.
Hausa.verse 50:42: Rãnar da suke saurãron tsãwa da gaskiya. Wancan shĩ ne yinin fita (daga kabari).
Hausa.verse 50:43: Lalle Mũ ne haƙĩƙa, Mu ne ke rãyarwa, kuma Mũ ne ke kashẽwa, kuma zuwa gare Mu kawai ne makõmar take.
Hausa.verse 50:44: Rãnar da ƙasã ke tsattsãgẽwa daga gare su, sunã mãsu gaggãwa. Wancan tãrãwar mutãne ne, mai sauƙi a gare Mu.
Hausa.verse 50:45: Mũ ne mafi sani game da abin da suke faɗi, kuma bã zã ka zama mai tĩlasta su ba. Sabõda haka ka tunatar game da Alƙur'ani, ga wanda ke tsõron ƙyacewaTa.

Hindi.verse 50:1: क़ाफ़ क़ुरान मजीद की क़सम (मोहम्मद पैग़म्बर हैं)
Hindi.verse 50:2: लेकिन इन (काफिरों) को ताज्जुब है कि उन ही में एक (अज़ाब से) डराने वाला (पैग़म्बर) उनके पास आ गया तो कुफ्फ़ार कहने लगे ये तो एक अजीब बात है
Hindi.verse 50:3: भला जब हम मर जाएँगे और (सड़ गल कर) मिटटी हो जाएँगे तो फिर ये दोबार ज़िन्दा होना (अक्ल से) बईद (बात है)
Hindi.verse 50:4: उनके जिस्मों से ज़मीन जिस चीज़ को (खा खा कर) कम करती है वह हमको मालूम है और हमारे पास तो तहरीरी याददाश्त किताब लौहे महफूज़ मौजूद है
Hindi.verse 50:5: मगर जब उनके पास दीन (हक़) आ पहुँचा तो उन्होने उसे झुठलाया तो वह लोग एक ऐसी बात में उलझे हुए हैं जिसे क़रार नहीं
Hindi.verse 50:6: तो क्या इन लोगों ने अपने ऊपर आसमान की नज़र नहीं की कि हमने उसको क्यों कर बनाया और उसको कैसी ज़ीनत दी और उनसे कहीं शिगाफ्त तक नहीं
Hindi.verse 50:7: और ज़मीन को हमने फैलाया और उस पर बोझल पहाड़ रख दिये और इसमें हर तरह की ख़ुशनुमा चीज़ें उगाई ताकि तमाम रूजू लाने वाले
Hindi.verse 50:9: और हमने आसमान से बरकत वाला पानी बरसाया तो उससे बाग़ (के दरख्त) उगाए और खेती का अनाज और लम्बी लम्बी खजूरें
Hindi.verse 50:10: जिसका बौर बाहम गुथा हुआ है
Hindi.verse 50:11: (ये सब कुछ) बन्दों की रोज़ी देने के लिए (पैदा किया) और पानी ही से हमने मुर्दा शहर (उफ़तादा ज़मीन) को ज़िन्दा किया
Hindi.verse 50:12: इसी तरह (क़यामत में मुर्दों को) निकलना होगा उनसे पहले नूह की क़ौम और ख़न्दक़ वालों और (क़ौम) समूद ने अपने अपने पैग़म्बरों को झुठलाया
Hindi.verse 50:13: और (क़ौम) आद और फिरऔन और लूत की क़ौम
Hindi.verse 50:14: और बन के रहने वालों (क़ौम शुऐब) और तुब्बा की क़ौम और (उन) सबने अपने (अपने) पैग़म्बरों को झुठलाया तो हमारा (अज़ाब का) वायदा पूरा हो कर रहा
Hindi.verse 50:15: तो क्या हम पहली बार पैदा करके थक गये हैं (हरगिज़ नहीं) मगर ये लोग अज़ सरे नौ (दोबारा) पैदा करने की निस्बत शक़ में पड़े हैं
Hindi.verse 50:16: और बेशक हम ही ने इन्सान को पैदा किया और जो ख्यालात उसके दिल में गुज़रते हैं हम उनको जानते हैं और हम तो उसकी शहरग से भी ज्यादा क़रीब हैं
Hindi.verse 50:17: जब (वह कोई काम करता हैं तो) दो लिखने वाले (केरामन क़ातेबीन) जो उसके दाहिने बाएं बैठे हैं लिख लेते हैं
